Full Description: Schedule WhatsApp messages, set reminders, transcribe audio & summarize news
App Info Modal:
Zapia, your smart AI assistant, designed for Brazil and Latin America.
Zapia is your Personal AI Assistant, available 24/7 to make your daily life easier. Use it to schedule messages, set reminders, transcribe audio, summarize news, find products and services, interpret photos, generate content, and more.
Main Features:
- Schedule WhatsApp Messages
Write a message, pick a date and time, send us the recipient, and we’ll automatically deliver your message. Never forget an important message again!
- Smart Reminders
Create a reminder with text or voice, set a date and time, and receive a timely notification. Don’t forget to enable push notifications!
- Summarize News & Web Articles
Send a news link, and Zapia will summarize it in seconds. Stay updated without spending time reading long articles.
- Manage Scheduled Messages & Reminders
Keep track of all your scheduled messages and reminders in one place.
- WhatsApp Audio Transcription
Forward WhatsApp audio messages to Zapia and get an accurate text transcription. Perfect for note-taking, reviewing conversations, or accessibility needs.
- AI-Powered Shopping Assistant & Price Comparisons
Get 100% unbiased product recommendations tailored to your needs. Compare prices across popular online stores and find the best deals instantly.
- Local Product and Service Search
Find products and services near you in seconds. Zapia shows you the best available options based on your location and preferences.
- AI Image & Photo Interpretation
Send a product photo, receipt, or document, and Zapia will analyze and extract useful information. Discover details about products, instructions, or where to buy them.
- AI-Powered Answers to Your Questions
Zapia can browse the web and use artificial intelligence to answer any question in seconds—whether it’s travel tips, product comparisons, translations, or general knowledge.
- Smart Audio Communication
Talk to Zapia using voice messages and receive instant, AI-powered responses. Interact naturally—just like chatting with a friend!
- Restaurant Recommendations
Find the best dining experiences whether you’re at home or traveling. Discover top-rated restaurants, local favorites, and hidden gems.
- Recipes & Meal Planning
Create customized meal plans and AI-generated recipes based on your dietary preferences. Get inspired with new cooking ideas every day!
- AI Content Generation
Need to write something? Generate AI-powered texts, emails, captions, or creative content in seconds.
- AI Model Selection
Choose from a variety of AI models: DeepSeek, Llama, OpenAI GPT, Google Gemini.
Why Choose Zapia?
- Smart AI assistant available 24/7
- Supports multiple AI models (DeepSeek, Llama, OpenAI GPT, Google Gemini)
- Works for shopping, productivity, and everyday tasks
- Easy-to-use, intuitive, and powerful
- Optimized for Brazil and Latin America
Download Zapia now and experience the future of AI!
Zapia redefines the concept of a Personal AI Assistant, combining cutting-edge artificial intelligence with a personal touch to deliver a powerful, intuitive, and always-available AI assistant.

Full Description: The official app for Home Assistant. Control your home anywhere in the world.
App Info Modal:
The Home Assistant Companion app allows you to access your Home Assistant instance on the go. Home Assistant is the smart home solution focused on privacy, choice, and sustainability. It runs locally in your home via a device like the Home Assistant Green or Raspberry Pi.
This app connects to all the most powerful features of Home Assistant,
- One app to control the whole home - Home Assistant is compatible with the biggest brands in the smart home, connecting to thousands of smart devices and services.
- Discover automatically and quickly configure new devices - such as Philips Hue, Google Cast, Sonos, IKEA Tradfri and Apple Homekit compatible devices.
- Automate everything - Make all the devices in your home work in harmony - have your lights dim when you start watching a movie, or turn off your heat when you’re away from home.
- Keep your home’s data in the home - use it privately to see past trends and averages.
- Connect to open standards with hardware add-ons - including Z-Wave, Zigbee, Matter, Thread, and Bluetooth.
- Connect Anywhere - If you would like to access this app while away from home, the most secure and simple way to get started is Home Assistant Cloud.
The app unlocks your smartphone or tablet as a home automation tool,
- Securely share your location, using it to automate heating, security, and so much more.
- Can share your phone's sensors with Home Assistant for automations including information on: steps taken, battery level, connectivity, next alarm, and many more.
- Get notifications on what's happening in your home, from detecting leaks to doors left open, you have full control over what it tells you.
- Android Auto functionality lets you control your home from the dash of your car - open the garage, disable the security system, and more.
- Build your own widgets to control any device in your home with a tap.
- Text or talk to your local voice assistant on your device.
- Wear OS compatibility, with support for notifications, sensors, tiles and watchface complications.
Join the over 1 million users and empower your home with better privacy, choice and sustainability.
Compatible with: Airthings, Amazon Alexa, Amcrest, Android TVs, Apple HomeKit, Apple TV, ASUSWRT, August, Belink WeMo, Bluetooth, Bose SoundTouch, Broadlink, BTHome, deCONZ, Denon, Devolo, DLNA, Ecobee, Ecovacs, Ecowitt, Elgato, EZVIZ, Fritz, Fully Kiosk, GoodWe, Google Assistant, Google Cast, Google Home, Google Nest, Govee, Growatt, Hikvision, Hive, Home Connect, Homematic, HomeWizard, Honeywell, iCloud, IFTTT, IKEA Tradfri, Insteon, Jellyfin, LG Smart TVs, LIFX, Logitech Harmony, Lutron Caseta, Magic Home, Matter, MotionEye, MQTT, MusicCast, Nanoleaf, Netatmo, Nuki, OctoPrint, ONVIF, Opower, Overkiz, OwnTracks, Panasonic Viera, Philips Hue, Pi-hole, Plex, Reolink, Ring, Roborock, Roku, Samsung TVs, Sense, Sensiba, Shelly, SmartThings, SolarEdge, Sonarr, Sonos, Sony Bravia, Spotify, Steam, SwitchBot, Synology, Tado, Tasmota, Tesla Wall, Thread, Tile, TP-Link Smart Home, Tuya, UniFi, UPnP, Verisure, Vizio, Wallbox, WebRTC, WiZ, WLED, Xbox, Xiaomi BLE, Yale, Yeelight, YoLink, Z-Wave, Zigbee

Full Description: Set up and control your compatible Nest, Chromecast, and Google Home devices.
App Info Modal:
Create a more organized and personalized smart home with Google Home. Set up, manage, and control your Google Nest, Wifi, and Chromecast devices, plus thousands of compatible smart home products like lights, cameras, thermostats, and more – all from the Google Home app.
Personalize your home view.
Pin your most-used devices, automations, and actions to the Favorites tab for easy access right when you open the app. View your Nest cameras and doorbell live feeds, and easily scan through event history. Set up and manage Routines in the Automations tab. And quickly edit any permissions in the consolidated Settings tab.
Understand what’s going on at home with a glance.
The Google Home app is designed to show you the status of your home and keep you up to date with what you may have missed. Check in on your home anytime and see a recap of recent events.
Control your home from anywhere.
Google Home for Wear OS allows you to control compatible smart home devices from your watch. Turn on the lights, adjust the thermostat, or get an alert when there’s a person or package at your front door. Use the favorites tile or add a device to your watch face to make managing your home as easy as a tap on the wrist.
A helpful home is a private home.
Protecting your privacy starts with one of the world’s most advanced security infrastructures, which we build directly into Google products so they’re secure by default. And Google uses your compatible devices and data to make your home helpful, but only in the ways you allow. Visit the Google Nest Safety Center at safety.google/nest to learn more about how we protect your information and respect your privacy.

- ENHANCE Photo Quality Improvement: Restore low-quality images to be clean and sharp. Remove noise, improve lighting and colors, and provide greater detail, especially in portrait photos.

Did you capture an important moment, but the photo came out blurry? Blurry images typically become useless, but with MeeAww’s motion blur removal feature, you can restore them to clarity and cleanliness.
- Colorization: Transform black-and-white photos into vibrant color images, making your old memories feel closer and more lifelike. Full Description: Quick Actions instantly suggests edits that easily get you better photos.
App Info Modal:
Ever wish your photos could really show what makes a moment special? Lightroom is a free photo and video editor that helps you do just that. From your dog’s goofy grin to that sunset that took your breath away, Lightroom makes it simple to bring those moments to life, just the way you see them.
Whether you’re snapping pics on the go or curating your social feed, this app puts powerful editing tools in your pocket to make photo editing feel easy and fun. Lightroom is here to help you create photos you’re proud to share.
Easily make your photos look amazing
Want brighter colors? Softer backgrounds? A quick touch-up? Lightroom’s one-tap features like Quick Actions and Adaptive Presets let you enhance photo quality in seconds. These AI photo editor tools suggest the best edits for your images. Perfect for quick fixes or adding your unique style, no experience required. Use it as your go-to photo editor.
Remove distractions and blur background
Lightroom gives you access to tools that are approachable and give professional results. Blur the photo background for a polished look, adjust the finer details, or use Generative Remove to remove objects and erase people from photos in a few taps.
Intuitive, yet powerful edits
Take control of light with tools to tweak exposure, highlights, and shadows. Play with presets, photo effects, color grading, hue, saturation and add a blur or bokeh effect to nail the perfect vibe. It’s all about giving you creative control while keeping it simple.
Get inspiration from the community
Not sure where to start? Browse photo filters and presets shared by photo enthusiasts around the world. Whether they’re bold edits with an AI photo editor or subtle tweaks for a polished portrait edit, find a look that matches your style - or create your own. Save your favorites and make every photo feel like you.
Edit once, apply everywhere
Snapped a whole concert, travel day, or family gathering? Instead of editing each shot one by one, use Lightroom’s AI photo editor tool. Batch editing keeps your photo edits looking consistent - fast, easy, done.
Why Lightroom?
• It’s for every moment: whether editing photos for fun, capturing memories, gaining confidence or sharing on social media.
• It’s flexible: start with simple photo editing and grow into a better photographer along the way.
• It’s a photo editor designed to help build confidence, spark creativity, and showcase your authentic style.
Tools you'll love
•
Quick Actions:
Enhance your photos with suggested edits tailored to your pics.
•
Presets:
Discover filters or make your own signature look.
•
Background Blur:
Create depth and focus effortlessly.
•
Generative Remove:
Take out the things you didn’t want with this AI photo eraser.
•
Video Editing:
Bring the same creative energy to your clips with tools for light, color, and presets.
For every kind of photographer
Photo editing has never been easier. Lightroom is here to empower you - to capture sunsets, family moments, or your latest foodie find. With tools to fix pictures, enhance photo quality, and edit videos, Lightroom gives you the right balance of ease and control.
Download Lightroom today.

Full Description: AI image upscale, AI photos & avatar, Colorize old photos, Restore blurry photo.
App Info Modal:
With the AI model being the foundation technology, AI Photo Enhancer was designed for photo editing, including making blurry photos clear, restoring & colorizing old pictures, removing artifacts, sharpening, improving image quality to HD 4K resolution, etc.
#What's New
-
AI Photos:
Create your Linkedin photos using AI. Say farewell to traditional photo studios.
-
Remove Background:
Auto cut out figures and objects accurately.
-
AI Image Denoiser:
Remove noise and grain from photos with one tap.
#Main Features
- Improve photo quality:
Pictures shared on social media are usually low-resolution and retain compressions, AI Photo Enhancer - Lens could improve photo quality to HD 4K resolution and enlarge the image size for a better experience.
- Unblur portraits & selfies:
The face AI model will unblur your portrait or selfie into HD photos, which also enhances your facial details in an amazing way!
- Restore old photos:
With automated advanced AI technology, you can enhance low-resolution images, remove scratches and blemishes from old photos that have become blurry over time, and achieve stunning results with the AI Image Upscaler.
- Colorize black & white photos:
Using AI image colorizing technology, it is possible to add color to old photographs of families, historical figures, movies and more. This allows for a new perspective on the past by adding color to pictures of ancestors and historical figures.
- Enhance without losing details:
The AI model will increase the resolution 4 times, which brings you upscale small images by up to 400% with HD 4K resolution.
- Enlarge AI Art to 4K wallpapers:
Unblur your AI Art created by midjourney or DALL-E and upscale to HD 4K wallpapers!
- Turn photos into cartoon:
All you need to do is import your photos - and watch Lens brings you to art world in seconds!
#Why AI Photo Enhancer is So Popular
- Designers, who always needed to download images from the internet, may use AI Photo Enhancer occasionally as a second-processing tool to improve photo quality.
- Fashion trendsetters, without replacing the device with a high-resolution camera, AI Photo Enhancer can also do the job for you --- get the better resolution.
- Students, when you are far away from the blackboard, take it easy, try AI Photo Enhancer to make those blurry texts clear and visible.
- Workers, receiving lots of screenshots from boss and colleagues, but limited by the mobile phone storage, only see the unclear pic, by one click, AI Photo Enhancer will bring you to trace back to the main points of those previous meetings, zoom in the details.
#User's Guide
- 8G RAM and above
- Android 11 and above
If your device doesn't meet the requirement, that's ok, here is a online AI Image Upscaler for you:
https://ai.nero.com/image-upscaler

Nero is the link between your mobile devices, TV, and PC.

Introducing GenZArt – the innovative and intuitive mobile application that transforms your words into stunning images and avatars! Tell your story and realize your thoughts and dreams with our fast and advanced AI, all completely ad-free!
GHIBLI-STYLE TRANSFORMATIONS & AVATAR CREATION
Turn your photos into magical Ghibli-style characters, or create custom avatars with just a tap. Upload an image or describe your vision — our AI brings it to life in seconds.
ZERO ADS, 100% CREATIVITY
Our app is completely free of ads. This means that you can create and share your art without any distractions or interruptions.
CREATE ANY IMAGE YOU IMAGINE
Just type what you want to see, and our advanced AI will generate a stunning image in seconds. From surreal landscapes to character portraits and beyond, GenZArt makes it effortless to bring your imagination to life.
NEW AI-POWERED EDITING TOOLS
Craft the perfect image with our new AI-powered editing tools. Tap any object in your generated image, and our AI will smartly segment it. From there, you can choose to remove it, modify it, or even transform its surroundings by simply describing your desired changes to the AI. It’s editing made intuitive and easy.
GENZART SHOP FEATURE
Turn your generated artwork into custom merchandise like t-shirts, mugs, and sweaters. Share your creativity with the world, wear your artwork or gift unique items to your friends and family, all from within the app!
ENDLESS ART STYLES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Explore a variety of art styles and filters to choose from, allowing you to express your creativity in endless ways. From Van Gogh and Picasso styles to anime and game art, GenZArt has it all!
ARTISTIC FEED
Discover a world of artistic inspiration with our feed of beautiful artworks created by other users. Scroll through the feed, like and share your favorite pieces, and join the creative conversation. With new creations being added every day, you'll never run out of artistic inspiration.
PREMIUM OPTIONS

+ 4x Upscaling: Witness your images come to life in breathtaking detail as our advanced technology upscales them to perfection.
+ Cutting-Edge Art Styles: Dive into a world of endless creative possibilities with our latest AI-driven art styles. Discover innovative and captivating designs that will truly make your artwork stand out.

Rest assured, you can still continue to enjoy ad-free image generation without a subscription. By joining our premium plan, you unlock these extraordinary features and join us in pushing the boundaries of AI art.
Upgrade to GenZArt Premium today and take your artistic journey to new heights. Join a community of passionate creators who value quality, innovation, and continuous artistic growth.

GoArt is an excellent AI image generator owned by Fotor, helping you easily create amazing artworks from text and photos. 【PHOTO CARTOONIZER】

Various AI art styles to choose from, such as cyberpunk, anime, surrealism, oil painting, conceptual art illustration, etc, helps you create the dream AI photos precisely. You only need to enter a text prompt in GoArt's AI image generator and generate different AI-artworks quickly. Try the AI image generator now.

A variety of artistic filters of different styles and genres, such as impressionism, Van Gogh, ukiyo-e, sketch, anime filter etc., help you realize your distinctive creative pursuits, so that ordinary photos can become real art.

【EASY TO USE, FREE TO ADJUST】
One-click to turn your photos into artistic works, and support to adjust the strength freely.
【HIGH DEFINITION, PRINT SUPPORT】
It supports the export of HD pictures with 8 megapixels. Allow you to print your artworks on T-shirts, wallpaper, photo portfolios, etc.

Yeah it’s September but let’s face it - Halloween is here. Don’t blow your budget on a new halloween costume, use Lumica AI to try out every look before you whip out the cosplay supplies. Ever wonder what you’d look like as a famous goth? A superhero villain? If you joined a famous ghost bustin’ team? 👻 Wonder no more.
🧙 Are you sure you’re a tiefling though? 🧙‍♂️
Are you starting a new DnD campaign - and you really need to convince that last player that YEAH ACTUALLY your bard is very very obviously a tiefling - thanks!? Ok, we got quite specific here, some of our effects might come from personal vendettas but… we are sure you’re gonna love them too 😜
…On a serious note; changing your Discord profile pic to an awesome druid version of yourself while you discuss your next DnD meet up is a flex, and we’re here to help you make that flex. You might wanna update your Twitch & Reddit pfp after that too…
😍 The Crowd Pleasers ❤️‍🔥
Once you’ve made your first 50 avatars for yourself… you might want to move onto your friends, folks etc - share the avatar maker love. So don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. With state of the art claymation, barbie and extremely popular cartoon faves, all at your fingertips.
🎋 Cute Anime Looks 💕
Find all your anime character faves here and also enjoy a host of gorgeous comic, cartoon and anime effects - beach vibes, classic anime movie vibes, fairground vibes, cyberpunk vibes - your anime vibe is here, we swear.
…And there’s just so, so much more to explore. We’ll shut up and let you download our app now 😄
Talk to us!
Lumica is an avatar app created by fans, for fans - and we’re different to other AI Avatar apps - we’re about quality not quantity 😉
Email us at explore@piccollage.com with thoughts, content and feature requests and more - we’re all ears!

Full Description: Swap faces - Generate photos - Animate photos - Voice cloning - Cartoon yourself
App Info Modal:
Are you bored with your social media content?
It's time to refresh your social media content and surprise your friends. This app helps you replace any face in a photo or video with your own, generate professional portrait photos and themed headshots, create a funny talking head or make your avatar sing a song, change any voice from audio or video with your voice, and turn your face into any cartoon style. And many other AI tools can help you satisfy your creative purposes.
This application includes a complete set of AI tools for you to unleash your creativity with your face. With many up-to-date face filters and trending videos, it could be your must-have application on your phone if you are a content creator or you are the one who just wants to make your social content cool and fresh every day.
FEATURES:
We are adding more tools every day.
- Swapping faces: This application provides you with realistic face change effect. Get 100% real-look AI face for any purpose in seconds.
- Photo generator: The AI photo generator lets you create professional-looking business headshots, profile pictures, and social media posts.
- Creating a talking avatar (talking head): AI talking avatar or talking photo can make a picture come alive. It turns still images into lifelike character and helps deliver information with real voices.
- Voice changer (Voice cloning): also known as voice synthesis or voice mimicry, is a technology that uses machine learning to simulate a specific person's voice. It can generate speech that sounds very similar to the original voice.
- Cartoon yourself: Turn your photos or videos into various animation styles. Let our AI cartoonize your photos and videos.
USE CASES:
You can use this application for your own purposes.
1. Face swapping
- Change face in photo in a snap: Generate face-swap models for joy, projects and more to create swap face effect easily and fast.
- Reface models for art projects: Seamlessly swap faces in any art project using face swapper.
- Experience the gender swap effect: Try your outlook in different sexes and confuse your friends or families.
- AI face swap free for headshot: Stop spending much time and money on taking various themes headshots for different occasions.
- Get your hair mockup with AI face changer: Explore more possibilities of your outlook by changing hair styles and hair colors.
2. Generate images (photo maker)
- Easily and quickly create professional and realistic HD AI headshots and profile pictures.
- AI profile, AI headshots, AI magic, AI yearbook, AI business photo...
3. Animate photos
- Business: Create a speaking portrait video to promote your brand and introduce a new product or service.
- Education: Transform teaching materials, documents into videos.
- Customer support: Provide solutions of how to use a product, how to troubleshoot an issue with talking head videos.
4. Voice cloning:
- Podcasts & Ad Reads: Create entire podcasts, ad reads, or segments, in your voice without speaking a word.
- Announcements: Need to make daily announcements for your company or even public announcements? Simply upload a script.
- Marketing & Social: Create personalized messages, voicemails without speaking a word.
5. Toonify (Cartoon yourself)
Transform your avatar or videos into variety of animation styles.
DISCLAIMER
This software is meant to be a productive contribution to the rapidly growing AI-generated media industry.
The developers of this software are aware of its possible unethical applications and are committed to take preventative measures against them. This project may include watermarks on the output if requested by law.
Users of this software are expected to use this software responsibly while abiding the local law. Developers of this software will not be responsible for actions of end-users.
SUPPORT

– Edits are limited and require a subscription to unlock unlimited edits.
– Billed weekly, and annually based on the selected plan.

Full Description: AI Writer helps you easily write essays, emails, stories, poems, and paragraphs.
App Info Modal:
Write smarter with the help of our fast
AI Writer
App. It is a one-pack solution to help you write essays, emails, stories, poems, and paragraphs.
What is the AI Writer App?
Our AI Writer app is designed to help you automatically write various kinds of content including; Essays, Emails, Narratives, Poems, & Paragraphs. This AI Writing app uses the power of innovative LLMs. It deeply understands your content requirements (prompts) to generate tailored, unique, and high-quality content instantly.
Whether you’re a professional, poet, story writer, student, or any other writer, this free AI writer app efficiently caters to your needs. With the AI writing app, you can unlock your creativity, brainstorm ideas, and learn different types of writing.
Different Tools by AI Writing App
Our writing AI app is a toolkit that collects multiple tools in a single place;
1. AI Essay Writer
The AI Essay Writer is an innovative Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning based tool designed to write essays of different kinds.  Essay Writer is efficient to generate essays around any meaningful prompt. All the essays generated by our essay writing app are unique, well-referenced, and accurate.
2. AI Paragraph Generator
Our AI Paragraph Generator app can help you instantly generate paragraphs of personalized length and tone. It also uses intelligent algorithms to write paragraphs that are relevant, well-structured, & plagiarism-free.
3. AI Story Maker:
AI Story Maker is a fast solution for story lovers to generate unique, captivating stories relevant to their topic instantly. Our AI story generator offers different creativity levels, genres, & styles to help craft stories.
4. Poem Generator:
Poem Generator uses AI and Machine Learning technology to immediately generate beautiful poems of various kinds including; Free Verse, Ballads, Haiku, Sonnet, and others. With the poem writing app, you can generate poems of custom lengths, creativity levels, & types.
5. Email Generator:
Our AI Email Writer tool works to quickly generate email copies. The Email Generator is supported by AI models to craft Persuasive, Catchy, Informal, & Professional, & other types of emails. You can use this AI email assistant to streamline and improve email writing tasks.
How to Use the AI Writer App?
Follow the below listed simple steps to use this AI writing app;
❖ Open the AI Writer app. There you’ll see multiple AI writing tools.
❖ Click and Open any tool according to your needs to generate Paragraphs, Emails, Stories, Essays, or Poems.
❖ Enter your prompt in the app using clear words.
❖ Adjust settings, like Length, Writing Type, & Creativity Level.
❖ Now, Click the “Generate” button to get your result. Finally, Copy or Download it.
Key Features of the AI Writer App
❖ Powered by advanced AI technology.
❖ Crafts unique results always.
❖ The Writing AI app has a sleek user interface (UI).
❖ Generates fast results to save hours of manual work.
❖ Supports multiple languages.
❖ Provides Dark and Light Themes.
❖ Free AI writing generator app with no limits.
❖ Stores the history of each tool separately.
❖ One-pack solution with multiple tools; Essay Maker, Email Writer, Paragraph  Writer, Poem Generator, & AI Story Generator.
Our AI Writing App uses cutting-edge AI Models to accurately generate high-quality emails, essays, stories, poems, and paragraphs. With the Writing AI app, you can elevate your writing skills to the pro level.
Note:
Our AI Writer is aimed at providing the right information to improve and streamline users’ writing tasks. The application doesn’t help to write any type of sensitive, adult, harmful or hateful content. However, in case, you find such content generated by our app, immediately inform us via email at support@editpad.org. We’ll add that type of data in our filters to ensure it will not be generated in the future.

2.	When the app open, enter the text into the provided space. You can type the text there directly or copy-paste it from a source.
3.	Or, you can upload a file from your device’s storage. The text will be automatically imported.
4.	Choose a mode from the options provided at the top of the input box. There are four different modes that you can choose from.
5.	Once the process is complete, you can edit the output by clicking on the changed words and selecting alternative synonyms to apply in their place.
6.	After the text is finalized, you can copy it to your clipboard. Or, you can download it as a PDF file to your device.
(Note: For uploading files, you can use PDF, TXT & Word Document formats.)
Features Paraphrase Tool with Ai Writer:
There are many different features that you can enjoy with our Paraphrase App.
1.	Multiple Paraphrase Modes
You can choose from multiple Paraphraser modes to select how you want the output to be. The four modes are:
•	Word Changer - Word Rewriter
•	Sentence Rephraser
•	Paraphrase Text
•	Text Improver
Each of the modes works differently, and you can get a unique output (also Grammar check & Plagiarism remover) from each of them.
2.	File Uploads
Typing or pasting text can take up too much time. You can quickly upload files from your mobile device to speed up the process. There are three different file formats that are supported by our app.
3.	Modify Results
If you don’t like the changes that are initially made by our paraphrase app, you can make your own modifications to the output text. You can tap the bold words and choose different synonyms to apply in their place.
4.	Word Count Display
Our app shows the number of words in the text that you enter in the input box. You can easily see if you have input the right content or not.
5.	History Option
When you Paraphraser Text with our app, the past results are saved in the “History” tab. You can see the texts that you have rephrased earlier. If you need to retrieve an old result, you can download it back using the “History” option.

Craft Enchanting Tales Together 📝🌈
Bookrea empowers parents and carers to craft mesmerising stories tailored for their children. Begin by selecting the story's key elements: genre, setting, challenge, protagonist, protagonist’s special abilities, antagonist, and the resolution. Options can be chosen through descriptive text or from a collection of preset enchanting scenarios. Once the narrative framework is set, our advanced AI seamlessly weaves these components into a compelling story, ready to share with eager young listeners.
Interactive Reading Comprehension Quizzes 🤔💡
To enrich the storytelling experience and enhance understanding, Bookrea offers four types of interactive quizzes for parents to engage with their children:
Multiple Choice Questions: Select the correct answer from a range of options.
Fill the Blanks: Place missing words into blanks within paragraphs related to the story.
Match the Pairs: Link pairs of related concepts found within the tale.
Sort and Group: Organise sentences into coherent groups, reflecting the story’s theme.
These quizzes are designed to be enjoyable while providing a solid foundation in reading comprehension, ensuring children become confident readers and critical thinkers.
Celebrate Achievements & Visualise Stories 🏆🎨
As parents guide their children through the quizzes, they unlock the magical capability to generate images depicting scenes from their stories. This rewarding feature not only celebrates their progress but also motivates deeper engagement with the narrative, turning each reading session into an adventure filled with excitement and discovery.
Why Choose Bookrea?
Sparks Creativity: Encourages parents to create personalised stories for their children.
Enhances Reading Comprehension: Interactive quizzes designed to improve understanding.
Engages & Motivates: A rewards system that encourages continuous engagement and learning.
Safe & Family-Friendly: A secure space dedicated to nurturing young imaginations.
Join the Bookrea community today and embark on a magical journey of storytelling, learning, and boundless creativity. Download Bookrea and transform reading time into an adventure of imagination and discovery! 🚀📚

Full Description: Create your own story in an instant with AI Story Generator!
App Info Modal:
Welcome to AI Story, the revolutionary application that transforms your creative thoughts into captivating narratives within moments. Leveraging ChatGPT API, AI Story allows you to craft personalized stories based on your ideas about plots, characters, and genres, making storytelling more accessible and enjoyable than ever before.
WHO CAN BENEFIT FROM AI STORY AND HOW?
1. Aspiring Writers and Authors
- Overcome Writer's Block: AI Story helps you break through creative barriers by providing fresh perspectives and ideas.
- Experiment with New Genres and Styles: Discover and explore different writing styles and genres without the steep learning curve.
- Enhance Story Depth and Complexity: Add layers and dimensions to your narratives, making them more engaging and profound.
2. Content Writers and Marketers
- Save Time on Content Creation: Quickly generate blog posts, podcast scripts, and social media content without compromising quality.
- Attract Customers with Unique Content: Stand out in a crowded market by delivering creative and compelling narratives.
3. Teachers and Educators
- Create Engaging Educational Stories: Turn lessons into captivating stories that stimulate students' interest and imagination.
- Develop Interactive Teaching Scripts: Design interactive scenarios that make learning dynamic and participatory.
4. Screenwriters and Film Producers
- Generate Plot Ideas and Character Development: Explore new concepts for films or TV shows with AI-generated suggestions.
- Experiment with Dramatic Scenarios: Create unique dialogues and situations that enhance the storytelling experience.
KEY FEATURES OF AI STORY
1. AI-Powered Creativity:
- Innovative Story Suggestions: AI Story harnesses vast datasets to suggest themes, scenarios, and plots that are fresh and intriguing.
- Randomized Plot Generation: Stimulate your creativity with unexpected plot twists and dramatic situations.
2. Diverse Genres and Writing Styles:
- Seamless Genre Switching: Effortlessly move between genres like adventure, romance, science fiction, and more.
- Customizable Writing Styles: Tailor the tone and style of your story to match your vision.
3. User-Centric Customization:
- Personalized Input: Input your ideas, keywords, character descriptions, and settings to guide the story creation.
- Flexible Story Length and Genre Selection: Choose the length and genre that best suit your needs.
HOW TO USE AI STORY?
1. Normal Mode
- Begin by typing in your story idea or keywords that describe the narrative you envision.
- Select the desired length for your story
- (Optional) Provide more information about characters, settings, and genres to make the generated story align closely with your expectations.
- Initiate the story creation process with a simple click "Start generate".
- Once the AI has crafted your story, you can copy it or share it directly on social media, messaging apps, and more.
2. Step-by-Step Mode
- Kick off your narrative without selecting a specific length, allowing for an open-ended creation process.
- AI Story will produce the story in consecutive short segments, building upon each previous part.
- After each generated segment, you have the opportunity to tweak characters, plot points, or introduce new ideas.
- Repeat the process to expand your story as much as you like, exploring different directions and possibilities.
AI Story is a powerful tool that turns your ideas into vivid stories, catering to a wide range of creative needs. Whether you're an aspiring writer seeking inspiration, a teacher aiming to engage students, a marketer crafting compelling content, or a screenwriter exploring new plots, AI Story has something valuable to offer.
Don't let your ideas stay hidden! Download AI Story Generator AI Writer now to unlock endless creative possibilities and share your unique stories with the world.

Full Description: AI Relax Roleplay Companion. Act, Write, Chat & Talk in Open Worlds and Stories
App Info Modal:
- WHAT IS AI TALES?
AI Tales is a game that lets you disconnect from a long stressful day, get in the right mood for the rest and immerse into the world of stories, books, art, music and paintings.
- OKAY, CAN I HAVE MORE DETAILS?
In a nutshell. You are the protagonist of one of the many puzzle stories. Each has an initial setting with a brief description and a big goal. From there you have complete freedom of action. Rotate the story cube, direct it in an interesting path and immerse yourself in the created world. In open endless mode make any decision you want and tell the story. The possibilities are endless. Tales are unique and generated on the fly by artificial intelligence.
- HOW DOES AI WORK?
The game is created and controlled by a set of neural networks which generate sequels to stories, combine texts with thousands of paintings by famous artists or generated by neural networks and visualize them, immersing you in the world of art. AI scores your actions and gives you points based on how close you get to the goal.
- AND WHAT WILL GIVE ME?
You relax after a hard day, immersed in your own story, disconnected for a while from the real world and feel complete freedom of action in the colorful worlds you can imagine.
- SO, IS IT SOMETHING LIKE TEXT-BASED RPG?
In a way, yes. Unlike a large number of text quests, in the AI Tales your possibilities are enormous, because stories are generated on the fly by neural networks. You can also relax and play with just a swipe of one hand rotating the story cube. In addition, the plots are visualized with generated images, which create a quite unique and deep atmosphere.

Full Description: Dreamily,AI-assisted creative writing tool for literary enthusiasts and creators
App Info Modal:
Dreamily, a creative AI companion for anyone seeking for new stories. You can create a world and start a story with this world, or speak with its characters.
「Example: The Dark Side」
Jackson is trying to win back his ex-girlfriend, Hope, whom he broke up with recently after an argument. On top of this, he also tries to keep a secret from her, which would ruin the relationship entirely if she found out. His secret is that he is a street fighter who fights for money, and he has no intention of stopping this lifestyle anytime soon.
Character Entry - Jackson: Jackson is a handsome man with dark hair and brown eyes. While he may seem like an average guy on the surface, underneath lies a fierce warrior. He's a underground fighter who uses his fists to make money, and he's very good at it. He isn't proud of what he does though, because it involves hurting people. As such, he keeps this hidden from most others, including Hope.
Highlight Features
1) Chat with your favorite characters!
Click the chat icon to start a conversation with characters you find interesting on the discovery page. You can also start a conversation with the character you created by clicking on “My Worlds” on the “Me” page.
2) Online now: Immersive voice calls, hear your characters’ voice
You can call your characters' exclusive companion anytime, anywhere, by clicking the “Voice Call” button on the character details page, or clicking the “Call” button on the chat page. When the call is over, you can listen to the recording of the call on the chat page, and relive the moment.
3) Create Your Own World
Click World to create your unique universe. You can add a story background to outline your world first. Then you can edit entries of important characters and objects to record world info. Additionally, you can set main inter-character relationships to help Dreamily produce continuations according to the logic of your world.
4) Multiverse, written by you and AI
When you click the writing button, Dreamily will give you three options for the following plot.
5) Multiple writing styles
Dreamily has a variety of built-in collaborative writing models — General, Romance, Fantasy, Pure Love. Choose one to set the style of your story. You can decide the length of the sentence that AI offers; You can also decide whether it is a full sentence.
6) Share your Creation
Click Share on the editor page and Dreamily will automatically generate an image of your story. And you can share your worlds with your friends via links and world IDs! Your friends will be able to view and reference the public version of your world. Hurry and invite your friends to come and play in your world!
To resolve a complaint regarding Dreamily or to receive further information regarding the usage of Dreamily, please email us at support@dreamily.ai or join us at https://discord.com/invite/esDncB8zbH (Discord)

This app is ideal for both, profesional writers that are looking for a place to rest their ideas and organise themselves, or new writers that are looking for a place to get started (We've develop tons of guidelines to understand the type of characters, arcs, and the way to develop them).
The strong social component of the app will give you the chance to have your stories read & shared by friends and members of the community, while the character generator side of Auctor will help you to develop and fine tune your characters chronology and personality.
Story
Create, manage, publish & share your stories. You can chose to write your own stories or read other members' stories in genres like Romance, Action/Thriller, Misfortune/Drama, SciFi/Space, Murder, Fantasy/Magic, Horror/Suspense, Mystery and more.
Continue developing the story and growing its characters to the point where your story becomes a fully immersive book.
Don't worry about writers block. Auctor has weekly writing prompts can help inspire you to write better & better. You can also submit your own for other users to get inspiration.
Character development:
Create detailed characters which you can guide through exciting challenges that will define their traits.
Add profile pictures for your characters so you make sure you will never forget a face. You can have fun and enjoy the surprising names, traits and biography of randomly generated characters.
Name the characters to your heart liking or use the random name generator to create surprising names.
Create their own chronology in a simple but well design timeline.
Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology inside the application. Share an original story with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey.
Read original stories
Discover stories from around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all here. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new techno thrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on this app.
Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join the application, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories.

Full Description: Create engaging videos with text messages - Mobile storytelling at its finest!
App Info Modal:
Join 20 million happy users and unleash your creativity!
1. Write a text conversation in TextingStory
2. Create a video with your story
3. Watch it and share it
TextingStory allows you to write conversations just like any messaging app, except you can switch side by swiping left or right over the message area. You can also press the characters' names.
Take all the time you need to write your texting stories. The videos are automatically accelerated for a consistently fast-paced result!
Every key stroke is recorded so feel free to play with corrections, hesitations or misspells!

TextingStory pioneered a new video format in 2016 and has become wildly successful on various social media, with some users getting tens of millions of views of their videos. It got its own Know Your Meme entry and T-Mobile even reproduced it in a 2019 Superbowl ad.
TextingStory is also a popular app in education for spicing up course material or hands on activities with students.

Full Description: 100+ AI powered voices, reads PDF & 20+ documents, convert text to MP3 audio
App Info Modal:
Have your books, PDFs, documents, and more read aloud to you by 140+ AI-powered voices in over 25 different languages/dialects!
NaturalReader is a mobile app that can read aloud a variety of texts like PDFs, online articles, cloud documents, even images taken by your camera and so many more.
With over 1 million monthly users and over 15 years of experience dedicated to AI technology that improves the user’s experience, we are one of the most trusted text-to-speech brands today.
Our app has innovative features like the ability to convert and download text into MP3 files, OCR text recognition for PDFs and our camera scanner.
NaturalReader is also an essential reading tool for those with dyslexia and other reading difficulties. By presenting the text both audibly and visually, readers can focus less on the act of reading, and more on the content they are reading. We also offer a dyslexia-friendly font for closed captions and within our text box.
HOW IT WORKS:
Just like a podcast or audiobook, our app lets you be productive anywhere with your mobile device. Complete readings laying in bed, during your daily commute, or walking around campus. By listening on the go, you create more time to do what you love.
Listening to our app couldn’t be easier! Simply choose the document type you wish to upload, select your desired file, and you are ready to start listening. For the best experience, remember to choose your favourite speaker’s voice and optimal listening speed.
Here are just a few of the reasons why our 1,000,000 monthly users love using NaturalReader
-- Camera Scanner: Listen to physical books and notes by using your mobile camera. Convert any piece of physical text into audio, which reads aloud to you. Just take a picture of the pages you wish to upload and you’re ready to start listening.
-- Natural Voices: Enjoy over 130+ AI-powered Voices across 20+ Languages/Dialects to choose from, including our plus voices, the newest and highest technology of AI voices.
Plus voices enable fluid, natural-sounding text to speech that matches the patterns and intonation of human voices. Plus voices are available through our Plus Subscription plan.
-- AI Text Filtering: Choose to filter out distracting and unwanted text such as URLs and text within brackets. Our advanced AI technology will detect these types of text and ignore them, limiting any distractions.
-- Customizable Experience: We have loaded our app with features built to create the most natural listening experience for our users. Choose your preferred speaker voice and optimal reading speed for the best experience.
Other features ways to customize include a dark mode, word highlight, closed captions and an advanced pronunciation editor for new or unusual words, or to improve the readability of acronyms.
-- Cross-Device Compatibility: A free NaturalReader account gives you access to our Mobile App, Online Reader and Chrome Extension. Run out of time? Seamlessly continue listening from your desktop computer to your mobile device.
Supported Formats:
PDF, MS Word (.doc & .docx), MS Powerpoint, Mac documents, RTF, TXT, DRM-free EPUB eBooks, image files (png, jpg…)

Full Description: Speech recognition and synthesis for your device.
App Info Modal:
Power your device with the magic of Google’s text-to-speech and speech-to-text technology.
Google Speech-to-Text functionality
Speech Recognition provides speech-to-text functionality to Google and other third party apps to  convert what you say to text. For example, it can be used by:
• Google Maps when you use your voice to search places
• Recorder App to transcribe your recordings on device
• Phone App Call Screen feature to get a real-time transcription of your caller
• Accessibility apps like Voice Access for operating your device through voice
• Dictation or keyboard apps you might use to dictate text messages through voice
• Apps that contain a search by voice feature so that you can quickly search for your  favorite shows or songs
• Language learning apps that recognize what you say as you practice a new language
• …and many other applications in Play Store
To use Google Speech-to-Text functionality on your Android device, go to Settings >  Apps & notifications > Default apps > Assist App. Select Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google  as your preferred voice input engine.
Google Text-to-Speech functionality
Speech Services powers applications to read the text on your screen aloud. For example, it can  be used by:
• Google Play Books to “Read Aloud” your favorite book
• Google Translate to speak translations aloud so you can hear the pronunciation of a word
• Talkback and accessibility applications for spoken feedback across your device
• …and many other applications in Play Store
To use Google Text-to-Speech functionality on your Android device, go to Settings >  Languages & Input > Text-to-Speech output. Select Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google as your  preferred engine.
Note, on many Android devices, Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google is already available, but you can  update to the latest version here.

Full Description: Transcribe audio to text effortlessly with SoundType AI
App Info Modal:
Turn spoken words into written text effortlessly with SoundType AI! Our advanced app for transcribing voice to text and transcribing audio transforms your voice or video files into accurately transcribed text. Its also equipped with innovative audio features and AI-powered summaries. With our standout feature of individual speaker identification, its an ideal choice for transcribing from meetings, interviews, podcasts, and more. Supporting over 90 languages, SoundType AI simplifies transcription of conversations from around the globe.
Features:
● Super High Accuracy in Converting Voice to Text Transcription
Our AI boasts an unrivaled precision for transcribing voice to text, trained on an impressive 680K hours of multilingual and multitask data. Experience flawless transcriptions each time you use SoundType AI.
● Individual Speaker Recognition for Transcribing
Ideal for group meetings and interviews, SoundType AI identifies and tags different speakers in your audio, providing well-structured, easy-to-follow transcriptions.
● Uncomplicated Long Audio Transcription
Have lengthy recordings to transcribe? No problem! SoundType AI handles long audio files with ease, ensuring all-inclusive and accurate transcriptions.
● Engaging Transcribe Audio to Text Experience
Engage with your transcriptions in unique ways. Ask questions about your audio or video, and our AI will generate responses from the content, enhancing your transcribe experience.
● Summarized Transcriptions
Receive the key points and highlights of your audio in a concise, understandable format with SoundType AIs summary feature.
● Comprehensive Voice/Video to Text Transcription
Whether its uploading an audio or video file, recording within the app, or importing from YouTube, SoundType AI transcribes it into text for straightforward analysis.
● Broad Language Support for Transcription
With our sophisticated AI technology, transcribe in over 90 languages and dialects effortlessly, perfect for international meetings, research work, and global podcasts.
Use SoundType AI for transcribing spoken content from:
○ Meeting Notes
○ Negotiations
○ Interviews
○ Language Studies
○ Podcasts
○ Lectures
And more, all converted into simple-to-read text!
Supported Formats:
Our app accepts a broad range of file formats, including MP3, WAV, WMA, M4A, and more. If you have queries about specific file types, our support team is ready to help.
Export Formats:
Easily export your transcriptions in various formats, such as TXT and SRT.
Requirements:
Internet connection
Upgrade your productivity with SoundType AI - the future of transcribe voice to text and transcribe audio to text at your fingertips.

Terms of Use: https://soundtype.ai/terms-of-use

Full Description: Read aloud PDF, ePub books, web & RSS with natural AI text to speech reader
App Info Modal:
Speech Central: AI Text Reader is the most powerful text-to-speech app that transforms any text into natural AI-powered speech. Listen to articles, books, documents, and web pages effortlessly - perfect for productivity, accessibility, and multitasking.
WHY CHOOSE SPEECH CENTRAL?
- Read Anything, Anywhere - Supports PDFs, ePub, Word, text files, web pages, RSS feeds, and more.
- AI-Powered Natural Voices - Setup the connection to Microsoft Azure and experience realistic AI voices that enhance listening comprehension.
- Time-Saving Convenience - Listen to articles hands-free while commuting, working, or exercising.
- No Subscription Required - Get full access to premium features with a one-time upgrade.
- Customizable Experience - Adjust speed, tone, and voice preferences to match your reading style.
- Accessibility-Friendly - Optimized for visually impaired users, dyslexia support, and screen-free reading.
WHO IS THIS APP FOR?
- Professionals who want to turn articles into an audiobook experience while working.
- Students needing text-to-speech for studying, PDFs, and research papers.
- Individuals with dyslexia, ADHD, or vision impairments looking for an assistive reader.
- Multitaskers who prefer listening over reading during daily activities.
FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS:
- Read Aloud PDFs, eBooks & Web Pages - Convert digital content into clear, AI-generated speech.
- AI-Generated Natural Voices - Choose from a range of lifelike voices for a personalized experience.
- Supports Multiple Formats - PDF, Word, ePub, HTML, text files, and more.
- Offline Mode Available - Download content for offline listening.
- Smart Text Parsing - Automatically detects article text and removes distractions.
- Custom Playlists & Bookmarks - Organize reading lists and save content for later.
- Multi-Language Support - Works with various languages for global accessibility.
- No Ads, No Distractions - Enjoy an uninterrupted listening experience.
WHY SPEECH CENTRAL STANDS OUT?
Unlike competitors that require costly subscriptions, Speech Central offers full features with a simple one-time upgrade. It supports more formats than other apps, has better accessibility integration, and delivers AI-driven natural voice reading with advanced customization.
START LISTENING TODAY!
Download Speech Central: AI Text Reader now and transform the way you consume text! Perfect for anyone who values hands-free reading, accessibility, and productivity.
Notes:
- The free version has a daily/monthly limitation in the number of articles/books that you can add to it which is removed by purchasing the Pro add-on.
- The add-on license is valid only for the Android platform.
- DRM protected books (e.g. Kindle books) are locked to their respective vendor apps and cannot be imported into the app.
- AI based features may not work as expected in minority of cases

Full Description: Evie is a revolutionary eBooks reader that narrates your books out loud.
App Info Modal:
GIVE YOUR EYES A MUCH NEEDED REST
Evie uses Text To Speech (TTS) technologies to transform written text into an audible narration.
Evie is free. Really free, without any ads.
You can use for as long as you want, with any Text To Speech engine you have on your phone.
ENJOY THOSE BOOKS FOR WHICH YOU NEVER HAD TIME
• Listen to a book while commuting
• Listen to a book during your work-out
• When working in your garden
• Or go to sleep listening to a book
AUDIO PLAYER FEATURES
• Evie can read out loud even in background or with the screen turned off.
• You can control playback with your earphones buttons, either Bluetooth or wired.
• Evie integrates with your car stereo via Bluetooth. Play, Pause and Skip Forward or Backward from your car's buttons.
• You can control it from your lock screen or from the notifications drawer.
• Evie offers an Equaliser to fine tune the sound the way you like it.
DISCOVER AN APP YOU CAN TRUST
Evie does not require any permissions to run.
It does not need access to your files, your contacts, or any other information and it does not read nor store cookies on your phone.
TRY THE LIFE-LIKE AMAZON VOICES
Evie integrates with Polly, the excellent TTS engine from Amazon.
Polly is a cloud service that uses deep learning technologies to synthesize speech that sounds like a human voice.
This is a paid feature, and requires an Evie account.
Evie offers simple in-app purchases in a pay-as-you-go model.
LEARN A FOREIGN LANGUAGE WITH EVIE
Have Evie repeat each sentence multiple times, then optionally wait for you to repeat.
The key to speaking the language is memorization through repetition.
READ A BOOK IN A LANGUAGE YOU DON'T KNOW
Evie can translate each sentence on the fly, then read the translation out loud to you.
Evie uses the excellent Amazon Neural translation engine, supporting more than 70 languages.
This is a paid feature, and requires an Evie account.
Evie offers simple in-app purchases for in a pay-as-you-go model.
You can use for free, with any TTS engine installed on your phone, if you don't want to use the Amazon voices.
SUPPORTED FILE TYPES
• ePub electronic books (DRM free)
• PDF documents (without encryption)
• MOBI, AZW and AZW3 books (DRM free)
• FB2 and Compressed FB2
• Microsoft DOCX documents
• Rich Text (RTF) documents
• HTML pages
• TEXT documents
MORE APPLICATION FEATURES
Evie offers an advanced text re-flow option allowing you to comfortably read PDF files on small screen device.
Evie can open files from your phone or directly from the Internet and has easy to use and robust library management features.
Evie offers the easiest management of Text To Speech voices.
Evie remembers your TTS Engine and Voice preferences per language and switches voices automatically to match the book's language.
Evie allows you to customize speech speed and the length of pause at punctuation marks in sentence and at the end of sentences, so you can perfectly adapt the speech to your style.
Evie has a very easy to use sleep timer feature.
Activate it with a single swipe and then Evie will stop reading after the selected time.
After the timer ran out, you can always re-start it with a simple press of your earphones button.
Evie calculates the remaining listening time with high precision for the current chapter and for the entire book.
Download Evie now and enjoy a good book.

Full Description: Convert speech to text and record voice on your phone with Notta.
App Info Modal:
Notta: Your AI-Powered Notetaker for Smarter Workflow
Notta is an intelligent AI notetaking assistant that seamlessly transforms speech into text with outstanding precision and speed. Say goodbye to manual transcription—Notta simplifies the process, helping you effortlessly capture meeting minutes, interview insights, and important AI notes in real time.
Focus on the Conversation, Not the Notes—Let Notta Handle the Rest!
Key Features
- 98.86% transcription accuracy
- AI-powered summarization feature for instant insight
- Supports transcription in 58 languages
- Translate text into 42 languages
- Compatible with various file formats
- Auto-sync across multiple devices
-AI removes noise and delivers clear, high-quality audio.
Who is Notta for?
- Salespeople and consultants managing frequent meetings or negotiations
- Remote workers, telecommuters, and those working from home
- Media professionals like journalists, writers, interviewers, and bloggers
- Multilingual speakers or students learning new languages
Security You Can Trust
-SSL Encryption
Your safety is our priority. All pages are secured with SSL encryption.
-Security Certifications
Notta obtained the SOC 2 Type II certification on February 12, 2023, ensuring customer information is protected from unauthorized access. On September 14, 2023, Notta also received ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certification for its information security management system, reinforcing the reliability and security of our services.
Versatile Applications
-Real-Time Transcription and Summarization
Start transcription with a single click on your PC, smartphone, or tablet. Notta converts spoken words into text in real-time, letting you focus on the conversation instead of taking notes. The AI summarization feature quickly extracts key points from meetings, lectures, and interviews.
-Usable as a voice recorder.
Audio recorded in noisy environments is enhanced by AI during playback, removing noise and providing clear, high-quality sound.
-Multiple Transcription Options
Notta supports both live transcription and automatic transcription of pre-recorded files. Import audio or video files, and get a one-hour recording transcribed in about five minutes.
-Streamlined Editing Experience
Add bookmarks during transcription to mark important statements, making post-meeting edits faster and more efficient. Searching through recordings is effortless—simply enter keywords to locate specific segments.
-Easily Share Transcription Data
Save transcribed text in formats such as txt, docx, excel, pdf, or srt (subtitles). Export transcriptions with recorded timestamps and timelines, or share them via a link with colleagues and friends.
-Automatic Translation for Global Meetings
Notta supports 58 languages for transcription and can translate text into 42 languages instantly. This feature is ideal for international meetings, helping users understand unfamiliar terms and even improve language skills.
Plans and Pricing
Free Plan
- Real-time transcription: 3 minutes per recording
- Auto-transcription of web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex): 3 minutes per session
- Import audio files and view the first 3 minutes of transcription for free
- Dictionary: Add up to 3 custom terms
Premium Plan
- 1,800 minutes of transcription per month
- Real-time transcription
- Import audio and video files
- Auto-transcription for web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex)
- Export transcription data
- Dictionary: Add up to 200 custom terms
- Translate transcription into 42 languages
- Auto-proofreading
- Hide time markers
- Speed up audio playback
- Edit speaker names
With Notta, streamline your workflow and elevate your productivity!
Notta Terms of Service:https://www.notta.ai/en/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.notta.ai/en/privacy
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at support@notta.ai

Full Description: TTS Proxy for using multi TTS and online TTS APIs for different languages
App Info Modal:
TTS Router is a powerful and versatile text-to-speech application that serves as a central hub for managing and utilizing various text-to-speech engines on your Android device. This innovative app allows you to seamlessly switch between different TTS providers and customize your speech experience.
Key Features:
- Multiple TTS Providers
- Support for various online TTS services including:
- OpenAI
- ElevenLabs
- Amazon Polly
- Google Cloud TTS
- Microsoft Azure
- Speechify
- Integration with system-installed TTS engines
- Easy switching between different providers
- Advanced Customization
- Multiple audio format support (MP3, WAV, OGG)
- Language selection with auto-detection
- Voice selection for each provider
- Model selection for AI-powered TTS services
- Export audio files
TTS Router is your all-in-one solution for text-to-speech needs, offering flexibility, customization, and high-quality voice synthesis across multiple providers. Whether you're using it for personal or professional purposes, this app provides the tools you need for a seamless text-to-speech experience.

Full Description: Transcriber, Transcription, Voice to Text, Speech Note, Transcribe Audio to Text
App Info Modal:
Voiser AI is an advanced speech to text and voice to text solution designed to make transcription effortless, fast, and highly accurate. Whether you need to transcribe audio to text, convert voice memo into written notes, or use live transcribe for real-time speech recognition, Voiser AI delivers the best experience with AI-driven precision.
With its powerful speech to text app, Voiser AI ensures that every spoken word is captured accurately, making it an essential tool for professionals, students, and content creators. If you regularly take voice notes, Voiser AI allows you to transcribe speech to text with ease. The dictation speech to text and dictation to text functionalities provide an efficient way to take notes hands-free, ensuring seamless productivity. Whether you're using speech notes, voice transcriber, or speech recorder transcription, Voiser AI guarantees reliable results every time.
For those looking for a speech to text app free, Voiser AI offers a high-quality solution without compromising accuracy. Users can quickly convert voice memo to text, allowing them to organize, search, and review their notes effortlessly. Its AI-powered transcriber technology ensures flawless audio transcription, making it perfect for business meetings, academic research, and personal note-taking.
With Voiser AI, transcribe audio to text becomes a seamless process. Whether you're a journalist conducting interviews, a student recording lectures, or a business professional managing meetings, Voiser AI provides unmatched efficiency. The transcribe voice notes to text feature allows you to extract meaningful insights from recorded conversations without spending hours manually typing.
Voiser AI’s STT (speech-to-text) engine is built to handle different accents and speech patterns with remarkable accuracy. The voice transcriber talk to text feature ensures clear and structured transcription voice, even in noisy environments. Full Description: A Text to Speech app for people with chronic or temporary speech impairments.
App Info Modal:
Talkie is an easy-to-use speech app, specially designed for people with temporary or chronic speech impairments, as well as for blind, deaf, and hard-of-hearing users.
With Talkie, you can display texts to your conversation partner or have them spoken aloud in a natural male or female voice. You can also create complete sentences using pre-programmed words or phrases in the soundboard, fully customizable with tiles featuring your own colors, icons, texts, or photos from your gallery.
As a developer with a speech impairment, I know how frustrating it can be not to be understood. That’s why I developed Talkie: an app that enables simple, intuitive communication so you can convey your message within seconds.
Key Features:
- Type words or phrases and have them spoken aloud or displayed to your conversation partner.
- Personalize your soundboard with tiles featuring your own pre-programmed texts, colors, icons, or photos.
- Convert spoken or whispered messages into text and have them read aloud.
- Share personal stories with your own photos, videos, and texts, read aloud by an AI voice.
- Use the camera as a magnifying glass or let AI identify what’s in a photo.
Hidden gems include features like an AI-powered correction tool for fixing errors, a translation function, and an LED text scroller for concerts or clubs.
Talkie PRO
Upgrade to PRO for €9.99 per month or €99.99 per year and unlock premium features:
- Realistic AI voices (male and female).
- Unlimited stories, tiles, and folders to organize everything neatly.
- Choose your start screen: Text-to-Speech or Soundboard.
- Secure your tiles and folders with a PIN code.
Talkie lets your voice be heard. Start today and experience how easy communication can be.

Full Description: Transcribe, take notes with voice, or convert audio and video to text using AI.
App Info Modal:
Transkriptor: The Ultimate AI-Powered Speech-to-Text App and Productivity Tool
Save time with Transkriptor, your all-in-one AI assistant for transcription and AI note-taking. Easily transcribe meetings, convert voice notes and memos to text, and transform videos into written notes. Transkriptor combines powerful AI features with convenience and speed for a seamless experience.
Key Features of Transkriptor:
★ AI Assistant:
Transkriptor’s AI assistant enhances your workflow by generating AI summaries, drafting emails, and converting voice memos into text, helping you efficiently manage and interact with your transcripts.
★ AI Chat:
Interact directly with your transcripts using AI chat. Ask questions, extract important details, and get summaries—all through a user-friendly chat interface that saves time and boosts productivity.
★ AI Voice Memos:
Automatically transcribe voice memos with AI-powered precision. Capture every detail from your voice recordings, turning them into easy-to-read text that saves time and keeps your notes organized.
★ Convert Voice Notes to Text:
Effortlessly convert voice notes to text with high accuracy, supporting various formats like MP3, WAV, and M4A. Ideal for transcribing voice memos, meetings, lectures, interviews, and more.
★ Convert Video to Text:
Perfect for creating captions, transcribing video content, or generating notes from webinars and Youtube videos ensuring nothing is missed.
★ Take Notes with Voice:
Use Transkriptor’s integrated audio recorder to capture lectures, personal thoughts, or any spoken content directly from your device. Easily take notes with voice, then navigate your recordings and transcripts with AI chat for quick access to key points.
★ Transcribe Voice Memos to Text:
Convert voice memos into clear, organized notes with exceptional accuracy. Use our meeting assistant to capture every detail and create knowledge bases from transcriptions, ensuring all important information is documented and accessible.
Why Choose Transkriptor?
1. Save Time and Enhance Efficiency: Transkriptor’s AI features like the AI assistant, AI chat, and voice memo transcription reduce the time spent on manual note-taking and transcription. Let our AI handle the details while you focus on what matters most.
2. Versatility Across Formats: Whether transcribing voice notes, converting audio to text, or converting video to text, Transkriptor provides a comprehensive solution for all your transcription needs in one intuitive app.
3. Flexible and Affordable Plans: Start with our free plan, offering 90 minutes of transcription to explore our features, including AI chat and AI summary.
4. Secure and Private: Transkriptor ensures your data is securely stored and kept confidential, never shared with third parties.
Additional Features to Enhance Your Experience:
※ Import and Transcribe: Easily upload audio and video files for transcription. Transkriptor supports multiple formats, catering to a variety of use cases.
※ Export in Multiple Formats: Download your transcripts in formats like PDF, DOCX, TXT, and SRT, perfect for documentation, sharing, and archiving.
※ Speaker Identification: Automatically tag different speakers in your transcripts, making it easier to follow conversations with multiple voices.
※ Translation and Language Support: Transkriptor supports transcription in over 40 languages, making it perfect for global users and multilingual environments.
※ Organize with AI: Efficiently manage your transcripts with AI-powered folders, tags, and search features to quickly locate what you need.
Get Started with Transkriptor Today!

Yes! Sign up to receive free transcription credits. Easily transcribe audio or video files like Amberscript, Otter, Temi, Notta, SoundType AI Rev.com, or HappyScribe!

Full Description: Capture and log any multi-selection of cameras, sensors and location providers
App Info Modal:
NOTE: In order to successfully use this app, you MUST read the "Important Information" section below first! If the app is not working right, please contact us with details!
AI Capture is a completely free enhanced video capture app that, within the hardware constraints of your device, permits the capturing and logging of any multi-selection of available cameras, location providers, IMU sensors, pose sensors and other sensors.
The app was created primarily in order to allow great manual control over video recording (for instance to completely eliminate motion blur), while in parallel capturing time-synchronized IMU and GPS data. This makes the app highly suitable for extracting still frames (or video sequences) from recorded videos for machine learning / neural network / CNN purposes. The recorded data is also ideal for visual-inertial SLAM, visual odometry, mapping, 3D reconstruction algorithms, etc.
FEATURES:
* Record timestamped videos, with per-frame capture metadata and video encoding metadata in CSV format
* Record timestamped sensor data to CSV at custom rates up to 500Hz (as fast as supported, sensors typically include accelerometer, gyroscope, magnetic field and 3D device orientation sensors, but ALL device sensors are supported)
* Record location data to CSV with custom update time intervals and distances
* Record video at various aspect ratios and/or resolutions up to the maximum picture resolution (if supported this is generally larger than 4K)
* Record video at up to 60Hz (if supported by device)
* Record multiple cameras at once (if supported on higher-end devices, generally only works with one front camera and one back camera at a time)
* Record the complete device hardware capabilities in JSON format, including detailed properties of every single camera and sensor
* Manual, semi-automatic or automatic control of camera exposure parameters
* Manual or automatic control of focus and/or white balance routines
* Control whether optical and/or electronic video stabilization is used
* Control the bitrate/quality used to encode recorded videos
* Live display of active camera parameters like exposure time, ISO, focus distance, use of image stabilisation, etc
* Live display of frequency rates of captured video frames and sensor measurements of each type
IMPORTANT INFORMATION:
* The recorded videos and sensors are saved inside individual capture FOLDERS in the app's media folder. In a file browser on the device go to Internal storage -> Android -> media -> com.pap.aicapture -> captures and you should see the resulting "capture_XXX_XXX" folders once you have recorded something.
* CAUTION: If you completely uninstall the app then all recorded videos in the media folder are automatically deleted by the Android system.
* The default exposure mode is "shutter priority", which manually controls the used exposure times and sensitivities to be within certain custom ranges that can be set in the settings (e.g. to limit motion blur). The default settings of this exposure mode are trimmed for well lit environments (like outdoors), so the settings may need to be increased for indoor environments if you are getting DARK VIDEOS.
* To use the standard manufacturer-provided auto-exposure routine instead, select an exposure mode of "Auto (OEM)" in the settings (required for multi-camera). This generally provides the best exposure performance, but does NOT allow range control over the used exposure times and sensitivities.
* CAUTION: Settings are remembered between app runs, including settings like the auto-exposure bias.
* If things seems not to be working right anymore, try Main page -> Settings -> Reset settings for a fresh start.
* Telephoto cameras are generally not exposed by the device manufacturer to the Camera2 API, and thus cannot be seen by the app.
* The app's philosophy is to try and fail rather than not even try. For example, you can tell the app to record 4 cameras at once, but that is obviously unlikely to succeed.

Full Description: Photo filters and video effects! Retro and vintage presets for editing pictures!
App Info Modal:
Prequel is an all-in-one editor app with photo filters, video effects for Reels, and presets for your photos & videos. Be visually creative, in one tap and let followers feel your mood!
Vintage camera effects for pictures, retro photo filters and video filters, which you can use for your amazing Reels! Presets for your photos! And so many other video and photo editing tools! You will always achieve standout content with our unique app—with its fonts for text on photo, stickers, Vintage, Film, Cartoon, Grain, VHS, Anime, Y2K, and other video and photo filters and effects you can be visually creative, in one tap!
Prequel is a must-have app if you want to upgrade your photo and video editing pipeline, use more photo filters and effects, make your social media content fit a specific aesthetic, or just quickly give your casual pics and vids a more elevated look to boost your followers!
FILTERS FOR PHOTO & VIDEO
Over 200 Hollywood-quality photo and video filters for latest trends and popular aesthetics: WES, Dark, Teal Tone, Sepia, Black and White, Grain, Retro, Vintage, Anime, Y2K, and many more! (And that’s just the tip of the iceberg with our effects & filters for photo & video!)
PHOTO & VIDEO EFFECTS
Cinematic, Retro, Film, Old Money, VHS, Lomography, and other VFX, frames, and camcorder emulators, as used by photographers and filmmakers who know a lot about effects for photos and videos!
ADJUSTMENTS
Market's best adjustments for working with color and light, including DOF, blurs, HDR, ultrasharp, midtone details, color density. Photo and video editing has never been easier!
BEAUTY TOOLS
Body and face editor features to perfect your look: works on photos and videos from your camera roll! Compliment the result with our presets and templates for photos, videos and Reels!
TEXT TOOL
Over 200 fonts for stories, highlights, and captions: the iconic subtitles, text behind objects, plus handwritten, basic, and contemporary fonts. Add text to photo on top of our filters, presets, or other tools and make your content even more attractive!
OVERLAYS, STICKERS, TEXTURES
Unlimited potential for further customization with 60+ curated texture overlays and 250+ hand-designed stickers on photo for your visuals! Use animated text stickers with your own custom text. Say what you want to say in style!
BATCH EDITING
Applying the same changes to up to 10 photos at the same time and saving edits as custom presets to reuse later. Save time on photo and video editing! Create presets out of edits with multiple filters and tools used!
BACKGROUND CHANGE

Full Description: A Quick and Pro Video Editor
