Full Description: You can summarize your long content into a short text summary.
App Info Modal:
Make an effort to do better text summary. Boost your output! All of this may be done using the  text summary app, an effective tool that creates a summary of everything. It is very important to use a tool that can perform effective summarization. The quality of the summarization depends on the performance of the tool.
What Is Text Summarizer AI or resoomer?
It is an AI-based program that summarizes large texts into shorter ones. The most important sentences in a summarized document are generally included in the summary. Text Summarizer AI may condense three or four paragraphs into one.
Why Summarizing Tool Is Important?
When reading long posts on a smartphone, it's challenging. A huge screen is commonly used to format content. Smartphone users are forced to undertake a tiresome mix of magnification and swipe motions in order to read the content on their devices. As the narrative progresses, commercials begin to appear.
Text Summary app allows the phone user to swiftly grasp essential ideas in the information that was meant to be read on a bigger display. It provides a succinct description that is simple to read and adapted for smartphones and tablets.
What to Expect from Text Summarizer?
The summarization process is automated. Users are free to leave the tool to their own devices. This is what makes the tool different from human summarizers. It is not easy to do the job manually.
Human summarizers are often under-qualified and lack the skill to condense lengthy texts. Text Summarizer AI, on the other hand, is an automated tool that is easy to use. It is simple to operate. It is not difficult to understand the instructions. It is also easy to understand.
Text Summarizer AI is effective. It can condense large texts into shorter ones. It is also effective at generating text summary of long text.
Other Features
Choose the Percentage of Summarization:
This tool has an advanced summarization function. It is possible to choose the percentage of summarization and specify the number of sentences in a summary. The tool will condense the document into the specified percentage.
Free Text Summarizer:
Text Summarizer AI is free to use. There is no cost involved. You do not need to purchase the tool in order to use it. It is easy to install and easy to use.
Quick and Safe:
The summarization process is fast and safe. It is not a risky operation. You do not have to worry about your device being damaged or your information being lost. The tool is user-friendly.
Achieve Reliable Outcomes:
This automatic Text Summarizer has a built-in verification feature. It can identify and highlight any errors in the summary. The errors are identified using a machine learning algorithm. The tool is also able to correct the errors automatically. It is possible to identify and correct errors manually.
Use Offline:
You can use the free text summarizer app offline as well. The strong summarizer and paraphraser feature of this app make it unique.
Summarize Links and URLs from Other Apps:
This tool can be used to summarize links and URLs from other apps. It is possible to summarize a link from a browser or from another app. The summary can be shared via email, social media, or other platforms.
So, get this app today and start summarizing the long texts on your smartphone.

Full Description: Notifications summed up
App Info Modal:
Sum Up automagically summarizes your chat message notifications.
It manages your notifications to detect chat notifications and replaces these messages with a summary of their contents generated by an AI model of your choice (currently only Gemini models are supported).
A Google Gemini API key is required to use Sum Up. Your API keys are stored safely on your device only.
⠀How to use:
⠀1. Open Sum Up
⠀2. Grant notification access to Sum Up
⠀3. Allow Sum Up to post new notifications if you're on Android 13+
⠀4. Get a Google Gemini API key to use with Sum Up (The use of this API may require additional charges)
⠀5. Setup Sum Up to your liking
Sum Up supports summaries in the languages supported by Gemini.
Chats may be saved locally for up to 7 days to provide history functionality. However, they will only be stored on your device and will never be shared with anyone.
Help translate Sum Up to your language: https://poeditor.com/join/project/ETORmUsP8U

Full Description: Learn, quiz & memorize any knowledge with Feynman AI’s real-time feedback guide.
App Info Modal:
Transform the way you study, quiz, and memorize with Feynman AI—your all-in-one assistant, coach, and companion for tackling complex topics. Inspired by the Feynman Technique, our AI-powered approach helps you break down ideas line by line, gain clarity, and achieve deeper understanding for any exam, project, or teaching goal.
Why Feynman AI?
• Real-time AI Feedback
Explain or record your thoughts on math, physics, chemistry, or any subject. Get instant insights into clarity, understanding, and examples.
• Study & Memorize Faster
Use quick quiz sessions, flashcards, and iterative practice to simplify the complex. Ideal for exam preparation, professional upskilling, or daily learning.
• Personal Coach & Companion
Feynman AI serves as a tutor and assistant, adapting to your progress. Strengthen your core knowledge and refine your teaching skills simultaneously.
• Multi-subject Coverage
Dive into physics AI, chemistry AI, biology AI, advanced math, or specialized fields. Perfect for students, professionals, and teachers alike.
Key Features
1.	Explain & Record
Summarize concepts line by line as though you’re teaching another person. Feynman AI analyzes your explanation for depth, logic, and expression.
2.	Quiz & Practice
Convert your content into short quizzes and flashcards. Reinforce memory, close knowledge gaps, and boost confidence before any exam.
3.	Adaptive Coaching
Get personalized pointers from our AI coach on simplifying difficult ideas. Great for daily practice, tutoring sessions, or self-paced professional training.
4.	Track Progress
Monitor improvements in clarity, retention, and concept mastery. Stay motivated with measurable milestones and real-time feedback.
5.	Line-by-Line Learning
Divide big topics into manageable chunks. Whether it’s math formulas or complex theories, focusing on each line helps you identify gaps and correct misunderstandings.
Who Benefits?
• Students & Self-Learners
From high school algebra to university-level research, Feynman AI helps you memorize and master challenging subjects. Perfect for exam prep and beyond.
• Professionals
Simplify complex projects, presentations, or problem-solving. Ideal for engineers, analysts, and anyone looking to refine conceptual clarity.
• Teachers & Tutors
Improve your teaching methods, create dynamic quiz content, and build stronger explanations that resonate with students.
• Anyone Seeking Mastery
Whether you need a study assistant, a personal coach, or a consistent companion, Feynman AI guides you every step of the way.
How It Works
1.	Select a Topic
Choose any concept—from biology or physics to business strategies and advanced math.
2.	Teach & Explain
Present the subject as if instructing a friend. Feynman AI pinpoints unclear steps, ensuring your logic is sound.
3.	Receive Instant Feedback
Our AI tutor highlights gaps in clarity or detail. Strengthen weak points and sharpen your explanations in real time.
4.	Quiz & Refine
Set up short quiz sessions or flashcards to deepen retention. Perfect your understanding before an exam or presentation.
5.	Achieve Lasting Knowledge
Iterate until you’re fully confident. By focusing on active teaching, you convert short-term memory into long-term mastery.
The Feynman Technique
• Active Learning
Explaining concepts forces you to identify areas you don’t fully grasp, then fill those gaps.
• Clarity Over Complexity
Borrow Einstein’s principle: If you can’t explain it simply, you don’t understand it thoroughly.
• Adaptable & Effective
Works for any field—school subjects, professional skills, even personal hobbies.
Need Assistance?
• Email: support@feynmanai.net
• Website: https://feynmanai.net
Download Feynman AI today and empower your study sessions with real-time assistant feedback, personalized quizzes, and proven teaching methods. Quiz, memorize, and master any concept faster with a truly interactive learning experience—one line at a time!

Full Description: Memorize Notes & Learn Faster
App Info Modal:
Download Voovo, create study cards faster than ever and (f)ace your exams!
Countless studies show that active recall and spaced repetition are the two most effective learning strategies to memorize new information. Using flashcards for studying is the easiest way to utilize these methods, however, it has always been extremely time consuming to make flashcards… NOT ANYMORE! Voovo takes the concept of study cards to another level and lets you create 150+ flashcards in under 30 seconds!
WHAT IS VOOVO?
Voovo is an innovative free study app for school and uni, which helps you study fast by empowering you to create flashcards in a blink of an eye. Whether you need to study medicine, understand math or memorize words in a foreign language, Voovo is the best flashcard app for you. Make a study plan, create your deck of flashcards easily and memorize everything.
Voovo is the first application to use SEVERAL INNOVATIVE FLASHCARDS:
1. VOICE CARD
Creating text and picture cards takes forever and they can't be created simultaneously while reading the study notes. Instead of typing in the question and the answer, just use your voice and make flashcards fast: 3-5 times faster than with the regular method.
2. DIAGRAM CARD
This is the fastest way to create a study card. This method allows you to make more than 300 in just 1 minute. You simply take a picture of a diagram and Voovo does all the rest: using text analyzing algorithm, we find all the text on the picture, put it into boxes and your flashcards are ready to be revised.
3. FILL IN THE BLANKS CARD
Instead of typing in the answer, simply choose the words you want to hide in the question. Very useful for definitions or memorizing paragraphs. You can create fill in the blanks easily: simply take a picture of the textbook, Voovo scans the text for you automatically and you are ready to go.
4. SIMPLE FLASHCARD
The very well-known question and answer combination. Add text, images to your flashcards and memorize anything you want.
WHAT YOU GET WITH VOOVO:
-Use our innovative flashcards, study faster than ever and ace your exams.
-Learn as you like with our different study methods.
-Organize your subjects and topics in the file system.
-Enjoy the minimalistic, easy to use interface.
-Make your study plan to help efficient learning and progress.
-Be reminded anytime you need to revise your cards/material/study notes.
-Easily share your deck of flashcards with your friends.
-Import study material and existing cards from other study apps.
-Invite your friends and USE OUR PREMIUM FEATURES FOR FREE.
THE ALGORITHM WE USE…
Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. Customer reviews suggest that the best spaced repetition algorithm out there is Anki’s, that is the one we chose to use.
SIGN UP NOW FOR FREE AND USE THE FASTEST FLASHCARDS IN THE WORLD!

Full Description: Learn math, step-by-step
App Info Modal:
Photomath is known worldwide for helping millions of learners to learn, practice, and understand math – one step at a time.
Scan any math problem with the Photomath app to get step-by-step explanations with accurate solutions and a variety of teacher-approved methods. Math is about the process, so Photomath breaks your problem into bite-sized steps to help you understand the “what” and “why” along with the “how.” Whether you’re learning basic arithmetic or advanced geometry, we’ll tackle it together, step by step.
Why Photomath?
Billions of math problems: From elementary arithmetic to advanced calculus and everything in between, Photomath can solve billions of math problems—including word problems! Whether handwritten, in a textbook, or on a screen, Photomath is here to help you untangle your trickiest problem.
Step-by-step explanations: Math isn’t just about an answer. It’s about every step along the way. That’s why Photomath breaks down each step, so you can *really* learn. Less guesswork = less stress, especially with our new Animated Steps, which show you the exact progression of a particular step. Get basic step-by-step explanations at no charge when you download Photomath.
Expert-developed methods: Photomath’s educational content is centered around the learner’s experience, driven by the expertise of our own team of mathematicians and former math teachers.
Self-paced learning: Photomath’s instant support is like having a 24/7 virtual tutor. Checking your homework before dinner? Stuck on a problem at 2am? We can help. Follow our detailed steps, taking whatever time you need to review definitions, rationale, and more – all within the explanation.
Want to dive deeper and explore more ways to learn? Photomath Plus can get you there with custom Animated Tutorials, detailed Textbook Solutions, and more!
KEY FEATURES
• Step-by-step explanations included in our basic version (free of charge)
• Word problem instructions
• Interactive graphs
• Video learning
• Multiple solution methods
• Advanced scientific calculator
Photomath is for learners of all levels, including those studying:
Numbers & Quantity
Algebra
Functions
Trigonometry & Angles
Sequences
Geometry
Calculus
“The step-by-step guide is beneficial to students that do not have access to a tutor and struggle with solving math problems.” — Forbes
“A viral video about a new app looks like a dream come true for anyone who struggles with math.” — Time

App Info Modal:
A superb application to organize test papers, wrong questions, and homework!
It helps you study more efficiently and prepare for exams with ease.
・Take a picture of your homework and test papers: automatically erases your handwriting and restores it to the way it was before you wrote it.
・You can take a picture of the wrong questions: organize the wrong questions efficiently and focus on them.
■Main Features
◆Automatic handwriting removal
・Scan test papers, homework, quiz, and textbooks with a single click.
・The scanner automatically identifies the edges of test papers and corrects them intelligently.
・Automatic handwriting and graphics removal to restore the pre-written state with high accuracy.
◆Revise wrong answers, equations, and formulas
・Scan test papers and assignments to automatically erase wrong answers.
・Scan incorrect questions and create your own question bank in PDF that can be printed and practiced at any time.
・Organize test questions by subject to effectively review and prepare for exams.

・Generate PDFs, images, and Word files in HD for printing and practicing without hurting your eyes.

Full Description: Create, save and share speech in 70 Languages! Over 350 amazing AI voice actors!
App Info Modal:
Storyteller App brings your text to life! Storyteller's artificial intelligence helps you create and share stories with style and an authentic voice, making it the perfect solution for teachers, storytellers, parents, and anyone who wants to share their words in an entertaining way.
No more boring, generic voice overs. With our diverse selection of voice actors and languages, you can make sure your story is told just the way you want.
Storyteller App is simple enough for anyone to start telling their stories. Use for game development, films, YouTube, and more!
HOW IT WORKS
Storyteller uses artificial intelligence to transform text to speech. You can create stories within the app by using various voice actors to make your writings come to life. Storyteller can also be used to read back any text in most languages. Save and share audio clips with your friends, family, YouTube and more...
"This app is great, this app inspired me to start writing again and even bolstered a renewed interest in publishing my future books!" - Vincent
"Awesome App! So much fun I just can't get enough." - C.J.

• Listen in 45+ languages & dialects.
• Change voice actor’s style, pitch, speed & more.
• Create engaging stories using multiple voice actors.
• Create voiceovers for videos or content creating.

• Copy and paste your text(s), select a voice-actor, and then listen while Storyteller delivers you high quality audio that sounds like real life people.
CUSTOMIZE YOUR SPEECH:
• Fine tune your content with 150+ voice actors, 45+ languages & dialects, and different stylizations all to your liking.
SAVE TIME & MONEY:
• How does this compare to pricing of professional voice actors? It is almost a quarter of a percent of what they charge! To hire a professional voice actor to read Tolstoy's War and Peace, you would be looking at a cool $20K! With The Storyteller, less than $60! It does not get better than that!
UTILIZE YOUR AUDIO:
Download MP3 for YouTube videos, gaming development, prototyping, TikTok, Instagram, and much more
This app is perfect for YouTube VoiceOvers, Business Commercials, Game developers, Film makers, or anyone who would like a Voice Actor for any reason. Create amazing conversations between voice actors and save them to listen anytime. We cannot wait for you to discover the bountiful opportunities within Storyteller!
- Happy Storytelling from the BuildLoop team.

Full Description: AI Voice-enabled Genius Personal Teammate with Chat, Image, Web, Hotword support
App Info Modal:
🔊 VoiceGPT (Voice-enabled Genius Personal Teammate) - The Ultimate Voice-Based AI Chatbot & GPT3/4 Powered Assistant 💬
Explore the top-rated free AI chatbot app, VoiceGPT, powered by advanced GPT-3/4 technology 🏆. Communicate with AI assistant via text or voice input and receive written or spoken output, just like you would with a human. Now featuring hotword activation and InstaBubble, VoiceGPT offers even greater convenience and versatility. With OCR support 🖼️, automatically read text from images and documents for AI to process and respond to. Experience the power and flexibility of VoiceGPT and its new features today! 🤖
VoiceGPT provides an inclusive solution for individuals with vision or dyslexia impairments who face challenges using traditional text-based chatbot services. With voice input and output features, communicating with GPT-3/4 model becomes much more accessible. Enjoy a seamless and convenient chatbot experience with VoiceGPT 🙌.
New & Exciting Features:
🔥 Customizable Hotword Activation: Activate VoiceGPT hands-free using the wake-up phrase "Hey, Chat" or even set your own wake-up phrase for a more convenient personalized experience.
🚀 InstaBubble: Use the floating bubble to easily switch between VoiceGPT and other apps, and listen for prompts when InstaBubble is clicked.
🤖 Assistant Integration: Set VoiceGPT as the default assistant to be launched with home/power long press or custom events from apps like Tasker.
👩‍💻 RunGPT Integration: Execute code written by GPT-3/4 model and view the output directly within the app. Modify and adjust code with the mini-editor, choose from 70 programming languages, and access 100+ Python packages.
Existing Features:
🏆 Top-Rated Free AI Chatbot: The best rated free GPT-3/4 powered chat enabled AI assistant app on Google Play!
🗣️ Voice Input & Spoken Output: Communicate naturally with ChatGPT using voice input and spoken output.
🖼️ OCR Technology: Automatically read text from images or photos for GPT-3/4 model to process and respond to.
🤝 Share & Export: Share and export full conversations with friends with just one click.
🌎 67 Languages Supported: VoiceGPT supports 67 languages for both input and output.
⚡️ Enhanced Features: Experience improvements like starting spoken output after the first sentence and support for new-line character.
💻 User-Friendly Interface: Beautiful and user-friendly interface for convenient access to VoiceGPT anytime, anywhere.
💾 Frequent Updates: Benefit from regular updates with bug fixes, performance improvements, and new features.
🌟 Don't type, just speak! Experience the power of VoiceGPT and its innovative new features today! 🌟

----
VoiceGPT app is a versatile phone web browser designed specifically to help users easily connect to their favorite AI-powered websites and services. With innovative in-browser smart extensions, you can effortlessly utilize speech input/output and other convenient features, enhancing your interactions with AI-driven platforms. 🌐
Please note that VoiceGPT is a third-party app that is not affiliated with or endorsed by OpenAI or its products such as ChatGPT, DALL·E, etc. Furthermore, VoiceGPT is not affiliated with Google or its products such as Bard Chatbot, etc. VoiceGPT is an independent software application that utilizes the OpenAI ChatGPT model to provide users with a unique voice-based conversational experience. Full Description: Extract vocals, instrumentals, drums, guitars, and 6 other instruments with AI
App Info Modal:
LALAL.AI – a vocal remover and stem splitter powered by AI that allows you to isolate vocals, background music and 8 instruments with exceptional precision.
Our vocal remover is a perfect solution for those who want to create high-quality karaoke tracks, extract vocals, drums, piano and other instruments for remixes, mashups, and other creative projects on the go.
Key Features:
🎶10-Stem Separation
While LALAL.AI is a vocal splitter first, it also enables you to extract instrumentals, drums, bass, acoustic guitar, electric guitar, piano, synthesizer, and even wind and string instruments with user-friendly simplicity.
🤖Unique & Powerful AI
Unlike many other AI vocal removers, LALAL.AI doesn’t rely on external solutions. It runs on a one of a kind in-house developed neural network that uses a unique approach to ensure the highest precision and quality results.
🎥Audio & Video Support
Forget about limitations – upload both audio and video files in a wide range of formats, including MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, AIFF, MP4, MKV and AVI. The extracted stems are exported in the same format as the original file.
🛍️Batch Upload
Enhance productivity and save time by processing multiple tracks in one go, maximizing your creative output. Upload up to 20 files at a time, select which stem you would like to extract from each one.
🔇Noise Reducer
Remove background noise and enhance your audio quality for a crystal-clear listening experience. Whether it's hums, hisses, or conversation in the background, LALAL.AI will remove it in a snap.
🔁Unlimited Previews
Generate as many stem previews as needed to assess the app's stem-splitting capabilities. Evaluate the quality to make an informed decision before upgrading for full track splitting.
🎙️How to Remove Vocals from a Song:
Tap the Split Files button.
Select one or multiple files.
Choose the stem you want to extract.
(Optional) Enable the Create Preview mode.
Tap the Start Processing button to get results.
⚠️Disclaimer:
We strongly recommend against uploading content that includes third-party intellectual property unless you have permission from that party to do so. Users are legally responsible for the content they upload to the application.

Full Description: Real-time transcriptions of your conversations and sound event notifications
App Info Modal:
Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications makes everyday conversations and surrounding sounds more accessible among people who are deaf and hard of hearing, using just your Android phone.
On most devices, you can open Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications with these steps:
1. Open your device's Settings app
2. Tap Accessibility
3. Depending on which feature you'd like to use, tap Live Transcribe or Sound Notifications
You can also use the accessibility button, gesture, or Quick Settings to start Live Transcribe or Sound Notifications (
https://g.co/a11y/shortcutsFAQ
).
Real-time transcriptions
• Get transcriptions in real-time in over 120 languages and dialects. Add custom words that you use frequently, like names or household items.
• Set your phone to vibrate when someone says your name.
• Type responses in your conversation.
• Use external microphones found in wired headsets, Bluetooth headsets, and USB mics for better audio reception.
• On foldable phones, show transcriptions and typed responses on the outside screen so it's easier to communicate with others.
• Choose to save transcriptions for 3 days. Saved transcriptions will stay on your device for 3 days so you can copy and paste them elsewhere. By default, transcriptions are not saved.
Sound Notifications
• Get notified about important sounds around you, like when a smoke alarm beeps or baby cries.
• Add custom sounds to get notified when your appliances beep.
• Review sounds from the past 12 hours to check what was happening around you.
Requirements:
• Android 12 and up
Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications was made in collaboration with Gallaudet University, the premier Deaf and hard of hearing university in the US.
Help & feedback
• To provide feedback and get product updates, join the Accessible Google Group at
https://g.co/a11y/forum
• For help using Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications, connect with us at
https://g.co/disabilitysupport
Permissions notice
Microphone:
Live Transcribe and Sound Notifications needs microphone access to transcribe the speech and sounds around you. The audio is not stored after transcriptions or recognized sounds are processed.
Notifications:
Sound Notifications features require notifications access in order to notify you of sounds.
Nearby devices:
Live Transcribe needs access to nearby devices to connect with your Bluetooth microphones.

Full Description: Live captions: caption calls, live videos, podcasts, & more!
App Info Modal:
Live captions for Deaf and hard-of-hearing people. Ava breaks down communication barriers between Deaf and hearing worlds with total access to real-time conversations, ensuring 24/7 accessibility.
Ava’s speech-to-text app provides 24/7 real-time audio transcription with 90% accuracy based on AI with up to 99% accuracy with Ava Scribe.
Use Ava to transcribe or live caption voice-to-text for classrooms, business meetings, doctor’s appointments, shopping, events, and more. Ava’s speech-to-text app makes transcribing any live communication easy for friends, family, and organizations to be inclusive, accessible, and ADA-compliant!
Why Ava?
• Live Captions, 24/7 🗯️ Ava uses your smartphone’s mic to transcribe voice-to-text so you have live captions, in your pocket – it’s always available, anytime, anywhere.
• Use voice to text 📣 Simply type what you want to say, and have Ava read it out loud for you.
• Works with any app 📱Never miss out on podcasts or live videos with the ability to have Ava’s captions overlay any app.
• No Wi-Fi? No Problem 🛜 Your captions are always available, with our without phone service or WiFi - Ava works on airplane mode.
• Available on Mobile & Desktop 💻 Paired with Ava for Web, you can use Ava on your phone or computer, which is perfect for online meetings or hybrid classes using any videoconferencing service including Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet.
• Transcripts are saved in the cloud ☁️ Use this Ava mobile app along with Ava Web and Desktop App where all your transcriptions are available on any device.
How Ava works:
• Download Ava on your phone to instantly transcribe voice-to-text from up to a meter away.
• Teach Ava to improve and learn your vocabulary as it transcribes voice to text by tapping on words to correct them or adding your custom vocabulary.
• Need accessibility for people who are hard-of-hearing or Deaf in more complex situations? Use the ‘Discover’ menu to learn how to set up Ava to live caption voice-to-text in any situation!
Questions? Contact us!
Chat with our trusty customer support team through email at help@ava.me!
Use Ava on the web at ava.me
ava.me/privacy
ava.me/terms

Full Description: Audio to text converter, Voice to text, Dictate, turboscribe,Descript,Otter ai
App Info Modal:
Voice Transcriber is a speech to text app that transcribes meetings, class, audio, and voice to text! Use an automatic transcription app to take meeting notes and dictate interviews. It supports all file formats, so you can easily convert audio and video to text! The speech to text app offers 15 minutes of free transcription. So, you can test the accuracy of the audio transcriber.
- Audio to text converter takes meeting notes for you!
- Be more productive in school, work, and life.
- Convert mp4 and mp3 to text.
- Automatically convert audio to text within seconds with Voice transcriber.
- Add subtitles to videos by exporting SRT files.
- Transcribe voice memos via transcriber for WhatsApp.
What is Voice Transcriber?
It is a transcription app that converts voice to text by using Whisper, an AI powered technology similar to Happy Scribe, Transcribeme, Voicepop, and Otter ai. Our audio dictation app can be used in many ways: from dictating an interview to creating video captions. No sign up is needed to try the dictation app for free. You can start a new transcription pressing the “+” button and export or view your previous memo or voice recording.
Why Should You Use Voice Transcriber?
No Subscription: You only pay for the minutes you used. First 15 minutes is Free.
Fast Voice to text converter: Automatic dictations are as accurate as manual dictation. Moreover, it takes less time to do automatic transcription than manual transcriber. Unlike other transcription apps, Transcribe provides you with speed, accuracy, and affordability at the same time. So, you can easily take speech notes and create subtitles and captions for videos.
Transcribe audio to text easily: You can record voice and transcribe by one click. You can easily dictate voice to text, transcribe interviews, and use Transcribe as a subtitle generator tool for voice notes or podcast transcripts. You can also transcribe WhatsApp voice note through the app.
Convenient speech to text: With Transcribe, one of the best voice to text converter, you can transform many file formats like m4a, wav, mp4, and mp3 to text. It can transcribe video to text or voice to text. It will help you add subtitles to videos. You can generate Youtube Video subtitle with auto cap. It can even convert your speech notes to text and dictate your podcasts. You can easily convert your audio and video to text. Also, you can transcribe YouTube videos to text. Copy and paste the video link and let Transkriptor convert Youtube to text.
Affordable voice to text app: Transcribe provides audio to text converter and video to text converter at the lowest price. In addition, the first 15 minutes are free. If you like the performance, you can start to convert voice to text automatically. You will see that Transcribe is more efficient than many speech to text apps. It supports verbatim group transcribes so that you can use it for multi-speaker speeches and meetings.
Accurate dictation to text: Powered by state-of-the-art A.I. speech-to-text algorithm; therefore, its accuracy can reach 99% (depending on the language and audio quality). It learns speech patterns like an otter and atexto, and accuracy improves daily. So it can yield better results than some of the best speech to text services. Transcribe is an online transcription app, so you need an internet connection to transcribe notes or use a caption generator for videos.
How can I improve transcription audio to text quality? Background noise is the enemy of the transcript. Try indoor recording and clean your audio before transcribing your audio recording.
Can I transcribe for free?
Yes! The first 15 minutes are free. Transcribe audio or video files like turboscribe, Descript, Amberscript, Otter ai, Temi, Rev.com, or HappyScribe!

Professional CV templates

No more time wasted on guessing what to put in your resume. The My Perfect Resume Builder includes dozens of resume templates with thousands of job-specific bullet points for you to customize. It doesn't matter if you're new to the job market or a veteran—we can help craft a resume that reflects your experience level and field.
GET EXPERT GUIDANCE EVERY STEP OF THE WAY
Stand out from the crowd and make sure recruiters and employers take notice with guidance from our experts that is backed by research. From start to finish, we will show you how to make a resume, by recommending the best resume format for your work experience, and providing professional advice to emphasize your strengths and accomplishments. My Perfect Resume will help you feel confident during your job-seeking process.
CREATE A NEW RESUME OR IMPORT YOUR OWN
Our simple technology allows you to upload and reformat your existing resume or start from scratch. We’ll cover everything from your education, to your work history, skills, and more.
DOWNLOAD & SHARE IN MULTIPLE FORMATS
You can download, print and share your resume in your preferred format and access it from your mobile device or computer by searching MyPerfectResume.com. Feel at ease knowing you can apply for jobs anytime, anywhere.
MAKE AN ATS-FRIENDLY IMPRESSION
Many companies rely on Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) to manage large amounts of resumes they receive. ATS scans your resume, compares the requirements for each job and decides on a score for you. This helps recruiters speed up their selection process. My Perfect Resume offers customizable resume templates that are designed to pass through ATS.

Full Description: Create Your Job-Winning Resume. Use High-quality Templates, Graphics & Fonts
App Info Modal:
Create Your Job-winning Resume - (Free) CV Maker
🥇 Only 2% of resumes make it past the first round. Be in the top 2%
Use professional field-tested resume templates that follow the exact ‘resume rules’ employers look for. Easy to use and done within minutes - try now for free!
Getting that dream job can seem like an impossible task. We’re here to change that. Give yourself a real advantage with the best online resume maker: created by experts, improved by data, trusted by millions of professionals.
🏆 Make a resume that wins interviews
Use our resume maker with its advanced creation tools to tell a professional story that engages recruiters, hiring managers and even CEOs.
🎯 A recruiter-tested CV maker tool
Our resume builder and its pre-generated content are tested by recruiters and IT experts. We help your CV become truly competitive in the hiring process.
Included features:
👨‍🎨 Professional templates for all types of jobs
Create a professional CV with the #1 Resume Builder tool. Modern Resume and cover letter will help you get more job offers in 2022! Download Resume in PDF or send it from the CV maker app to your future employer. Our service offers professionally-designed resume templates and examples (+ guides). Just edit and download them in 5 minutes. Choose a resume template that suits your needs and create a curriculum vitae to win you a dream job!
💼 14 resume sections
Available sections are: personal info, career objective, professional experience, education, skills, languages, hobbies, certificates and others
✅ Resume score
Once you’re done filling out your document in the editor, our resume builder will score it against your competitors and give you detailed tips on how exactly to improve your resume.
🔗 Share link to your CV
Just copy web link to your CV and share it to your future employer
📋 Export to PDF
Just click the view button to generate your resume and export it to any source you want. Easily download and share your CV in PDF format. Save to your device or Google Drive. Share as an attachment via email. Send your curriculum vitae to your contacts so they can give you feedback.
👀 Real-time preview
You can view your resume every time you make changes, even without internet access. When viewing, export is also available
⛰️ Offline support
We also fully support offline mode. This means you can edit, view and export your CVs even without internet access
📱 Sync between devices
Save all information and photos for your resume in our secure cloud storage. You can log in to your account from another device and your resumes will be available due to the fact that we store them in the cloud
🌐 Multi-languages
We currently support 12 languages. We support English, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, Spanish, Ukrainian
✏️ Create your own custom CV sections
Quickly add sections to your resume with custom titles. Perfect if you have experience that doesn’t fit into traditional CV sections.
🌚 Dark mode
Use our genius CV maker without straining your eyes.
👨‍💼 Add your photo to your CV
Upload a professional headshot and add it to your curriculum vitae with our resume creator.

Full Description: Build online resume and curriculum vitae using premium templates by Workruit
App Info Modal:
Welcome to Workruit – your ultimate mobile app for creating professional Resumes and CVs, and further unlocking job opportunities!
Join over 2,000,000 satisfied users who have downloaded 10,000,000+ resumes & CVs to enhance their job search journey. Whether you are a seasoned professional or just starting your career journey, our app offers everything you need to stand out in today's competitive job market.
Easily create industry-compliant resumes with Workruit Resume mobile application. Choose from over 20+ HR-approved industry specific templates tailored to various job domains, ensuring your Resume stands out whether you are a fresher or a seasoned professional. Seamlessly integrate job search options into your mobile resume-building journey, browsing through a vast array of job vacancies directly within the app. Download the mobile app now!
Key Features:
- Advanced Resume Building: Utilize our AI-powered platform to craft resumes and CVs tailored to your industry and experience level, all on your mobile. With intelligent text suggestions and customizable templates, creating a standout resume has never been easier. Leverage our advanced free resume maker to highlight your skills and accomplishments effectively.
- ATS Compatibility: Ensure your resume gets noticed by applicant tracking systems (ATS) with our ATS-compatible formats. Our templates are designed to meet the requirements of ATS software, increasing your chances of landing interviews. The resume formats are optimized to ensure that all important information is parsed correctly by ATS.
- Instant Download and Sharing: Download your polished resume in PDF format with a single click on your mobile application, or share it directly with recruiters using a unique URL. Our streamlined process ensures you can quickly distribute your resume to potential employers. With easy resume PDF downloads and quick sharing options, you can reach recruiters effortlessly.
- AI-Based Text Suggestions: Benefit from our AI-based text suggestions to enhance the content of your resume. The AI provides recommendations for improving wording, grammar, and structure, ensuring your resume is both professional and impactful.
- AI Analysis and Scoring: Compare your resume to the job description of your desired position using our AI analysis feature for free. Receive a score and detailed suggestions based on the comparison, helping you tailor your resume to meet the job requirements more effectively.
- Resume Examples: Access a library of free resume examples across different industries to get inspiration and guidance on how to structure your own resume. Learn from successful resumes and apply best practices to your own creation.
- Cover Letter Builder: Along with your resume, create professional free cover letters that complement your application. Choose from various cover letter templates designed to match your resume.
- CV Builder: Along with your resume and cover letter, create a professional free cv that complement your application. Choose from various cover letter templates designed to match your resume.
- Job Search Integration: Seamlessly browse through thousands of job vacancies and openings directly within the app. Our integrated job search feature ensures you can build your resume while exploring new career opportunities, maximizing your chances of success. Find the latest job openings and get job recommendations based on your resume.
Unlock your career potential with Workruit – the must-have mobile app for job seekers everywhere. Download now and take the first step towards your dream job!
Your go-to platform for job search journey, make a killer resume and look for jobs.
If you have any queries with our resume and job search app, please contact us at info@workruit.com

Full Description: A professional resume builder designed to make your job search easier
App Info Modal:
Resume.com, fully integrated with Indeed, is excited to bring our renowned free resume builder to mobile! With over 2 million job seekers crafting resumes annually, our app is a key tool for your job search on Indeed. Specifically designed with insights from Indeed, the leading job site, our app optimizes your job search and resume creation for Indeed.
Our resume templates, tailored for Indeed, are based on data from Indeed about employer preferences. We've collaborated with thousands of Indeed employers** to ensure our resumes meet Indeed's job market needs. This collaboration makes our app an essential asset in your job search on Indeed.
Kicking off your job search on Indeed? Resume.com's Resume Builder, seamlessly integrated with Indeed, is designed for both professionals and recent graduates. Our app, aligned with Indeed job search strategies, guides you in crafting resumes that meet Indeed employers' standards. Enhanced with AI Resume technology, our app provides professional suggestions to tailor your resume for Indeed job listings.
Asking "What job title are you targeting on Indeed?" we align our process with your Indeed job aspirations. Our library, featuring over 125 resume samples, inspires and guides your resume content for Indeed job applications.
Not looking for jobs on Indeed? No problem! You can easily download your resume or email it yourself with the click of a button so you can use it for your job search on any other platform. Including;  ZipRecruiter, Snagajob, FlexJobs, SimplyHired, Glassdoor, Monster, Handshake, LinkedIn, CareerBuilder, USAJobs, Ladders and Google for jobs. No advertisements, no payments, no upsells. Just Resumes.
Key Features for Excelling in Your Indeed Job Search:
- Detailed guidance with Indeed-focused resume suggestions.
- Professional Indeed-optimized resume templates.
- Customizable templates for various Indeed job roles.
- 100% FREE PDF resume downloads, perfect for Indeed applications.
- Advanced AI Resume tools for optimizing Indeed job search outcomes.
- Ad-free experience, focusing on your success in the Indeed job market.
Our app is grounded in Indeed data and employer feedback, making sure your resume is up-to-date with Indeed job market trends. Enhance your Indeed job search with Resume.com’s powerful, free tools.
*Data Source: comScore, Total Visits, March 2019
**Employer Feedback Source: Indeed survey conducted with Lucid, N=2661 employers among 10 industries
By downloading this app, you agree to Resume.com’s Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service found at https://www.resume.com/legal/. When you use this job app, we may transfer user data, such as your IP address, to service providers. This is for the legitimate interests of understanding how users arrive to Resume.com, supporting logins through different devices, and for measuring and improving the performance of our ads and our Site.
Please send feedback to support@resume.com
Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.indeed.com/legal/ccpa-dns
The Resume.com resume builder provides over 125+ resume templates and samples for a variety of jobs, including:
Accountant Resumes
Engineering Resumes
Teacher Resumes

Nursing Resumes
Prepare for your next remote job with Resume.com’s free resume builder.

Full Description: Ats Resume creator & CV Maker app to build intelligent CV for job application.
App Info Modal:
Resji's intelligent CV Maker app(Resji) will help you build a resume for your next job application with any of the 50+ professional resume & cover letter templates. Our LinkedIn & Indeed resume creator make your CV acceptable by the leading job boards.
Resji not only provides resume creating tool but also helps you to make a great cover letter and resignation letter.
You could download the resume, cover letter, resignation letter in PDF format. Further, the main resume will be shown in a unique online webpage with the template styling of your choice.
Key Features of our professional Resume Creator app:
1. Easy to create resume:
You don't need special skills to create curriculum vitae in PDF format. Fill in the biodata information, education, experience, skills,etc, and upload a photo, then move to the "Builder" section to download the resume in the template of you like. Creating a professional resume with the design you like is now easier as you could adjust the styling of individual resume sections.
2. Create ATS friendly resume with Ai:
With the help of AI CV writing tools, you can write a resume that passes the ATS systems used by companies. You could also refer to resume examples or demo for step by step guidance.
3. Write Cover letters:
You can create a matching cover letter to suit the resume template, to make your job application stand out. App comes with the 32+ cover letter templates & formats.
4. PDF resume formatting options:
Every aspect of the CV is customizable, from font face to text size and from date format to color of individual sections. With these options, you may compress your CV to one page / single page or two page resume formats. Download CV in PDF format for offline use or to print your resume for job application or share it directly from our Resume Creator & CV Maker app.
5. Good looking Resume Templates:
Choose from a wide selection of professionally designed CV templates tailored to various industries. Whether you are a nurse, teacher, educator, or working in any other field, we have the perfect template for you.
Here is our unique value addition to build your Linkedin & Indeed resume.
- Create resume by adding professional & personnal references, licenses, registrations, etc. You could download only references as a seperate file.
- Ask your friends & collegues to review your resume before submitting it to an employer.
- Create a online link for you main resume.
- Resume and cover letter templates: Add a cover letter to the resume or download CV cover letter separately in PDF. The CV Maker app has many cover letter templates & formats for various fields such as a nurse, teachers, graphic designer, Customer service, engineering student internship, IT Software developer, business management job, executives, accountant, bank job, etc.
- Copy other's resume: If a friend's resume is similar to yours and they permit you to use the resume. You can easily copy and edit their resume to suit your needs.
- CV Maker app comes with secure cloud storage with option to create resume copies to suit every job.
- Create resume in PDF: Most of the job sites ask for a resume in PDF format. As the app generate resume as a PDF file, your job application process will become even more easy.
Creating a resume to land your dream job is not easy and to make it pass through the ATS (Automatic Tracking system) used by the employer is even diffcult. However an easy resume creator app built by industry experts to make quick CV will definitely help.
For more information about Resume Creator app visit https://resji.com

Full Description: Build a perfect CV in minutes. Join 15 million people we helped land dream jobs.
App Info Modal:
Create a CV that lands your dream job!
MyPerfectCV has helped over 15 million jobseekers build their perfect CVs in minutes.
Take advantage of the wealth of recruiter approved one-click designs, CV content pre-written by professionals, powerful visual customization tools and expert advice to guide you every step of the way. MyPerfectCV is a true all-in-one solution.
DOZENS OF CV TEMPLATES
You will instantly stand out with MyPerfectCV eye-catching designs! In our huge library there are templates perfect for every job and every jobseeker - each offering a wide range of customisation options.
But our professionally crafted CV templates are not just about the looks. Employer-ready, recruiter-approved and ATS-friendly - any of our templates will give you the best possible chances of landing that interview.
PRE-WRITTEN CV CONTENT
Never get stuck writing your CV again. Our expert CV writers have crafted thousands of phrases and bullet points across hundreds of industries and career paths. Each of them available for you to insert into your CV with a single click or tap.
Thanks to our expert pre-written content you’ll save time and end up with a confidence boosting and professionally sounding CV.
STEP-BY-STEP EXPERT GUIDANCE
Don’t worry about how to write an effective CV - we have done the research for you. Our CV builder is loaded with expert tips and advice every step of the way. Written by seasoned HR professionals, our guidelines will show you exactly how to highlight your strengths and meet all the requirements of the recruitment process.
DOWNLOAD IN MULTIPLE FORMATS
Experience total freedom. Freedom to create unlimited CV and cover letters. Freedom to export, share and download as much as you want. Freedom to use PDF, DOC or plain text formats. No limits. With MyPerfectCV you will have a perfect version of your CV for every job.
POWERFUL VISUAL EDITOR
Our advanced CV builder gives you plenty of impactful yet easy to use formatting options. Customise template’s accent colors, font styles and sizes, text and paragraph spacing, margins and much more in seconds with simple sliders. Even if you change the CV template the builder automatically adjusts the formatting to make your CV look great. We have made it easier than ever to adapt your CV’s design to its contents - and your personal style.
TRUSTED BY MILLIONS
MyPerfectCV is rated “Excellent” (4.3/5.0) by Trustpilot based on 900+ reviews. No surprise there, given that our builder is proven to get you hired an average of 33% faster.
And that is a whole lot of saved time considering that since 2013 over 15 million jobseekers have created 7 million CVs in the United Kingdom and 60 million worldwide with MyPerfectCV.
AVAILABLE ON ALL YOUR DEVICES
Desktop, laptop, tablet, smartphone? Android or iOS? Native app or web browser? Whatever your choice you can take advantage of full MyPerfectCV functionality thanks to our extensive range of solutions.
Universal account sync and secure cloud storage on the other hand guarantee that you can access your documents in seconds on every device you own. You will never be without your CV when you need it ever again.
[1] Based on a survey of 300 respondents who cancelled the service because they had found a job. Calculation was made based on how much faster, on average, respondents were able to get hired with MyPerfectCV's help.

Full Description: AI-driven task manager for smarter planning and productivity.
App Info Modal:
Meet Focs: The AI-Powered Project Management Tool
Streamline your workflow, manage your projects, and automate your daily tasks with advanced AI technology. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, Focs provides everything you need to complete your projects successfully.
Integrated Project Management System
Easily create and manage your projects. Keep everything organized and accessible by adding notes, tasks, plans, files, and AI chats to your projects.
AI-Powered Tasks
Create to-do lists, movie lists, work tasks, and video lists with AI models like ChatGPT, GPT-4o, GPT-3, Claude 2, and Gemini. Manage your tasks efficiently, whether manually or with AI support.
Smart Notes
Take notes manually or ask the AI to summarize, translate, or enhance your texts. Focs processes texts sent from outside the app, ensuring you don't miss important information.
Detailed Plans with Reminders
Create comprehensive plans with AI support, from weekly fitness routines to travel plans. Stay on track with reminders and alarms.
AI Chats
Engage in AI-powered chats to generate ideas, conduct research, or solve problems. Upload photos, PDFs, audio, or videos to get detailed summaries and insights from the AI, simplifying your decision-making process.
Web Summary (Focs Explorer)
Save time with the built-in web summarizer. Focs Explorer provides concise summaries of web pages, allowing you to stay focused on your projects without getting distracted by lengthy articles. Save these summaries as notes for future use.
Focus Tools
Increase your productivity by blocking distracting apps and websites. Restrict apps based on tasks, block access until tasks are completed, or create weekly, daily, or usage-based restriction plans. Control notifications by limiting the daily number of notifications from specific apps.
File Support with Custom Format (FCS)
Add videos, photos, PDFs, and more to your projects. Export and share your projects using the unique .fcs file format that includes all project data. Sell these files to other users through Focs’ in-app currency, FCoin. Use the FCoin you earn on AI features within the app or on other shared projects, or convert them to Bitcoin and withdraw to your wallet. Navigate seamlessly through files in your projects, similar to Instagram Reels, for a smooth experience.
Earn and Spend FCoin
Monetize your productivity. Earn FCoin by sharing valuable .fcs files. Use your FCoin on AI features or other projects within the app, or convert them to Bitcoin for real-world value.
Encryption and Privacy
Secure your projects with our encryption feature, ensuring your sensitive information remains protected.
Image Generation
In addition to text generation, Focs now includes models like DALL-E 3, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, and DeepFloyd IF for creating images based on text prompts, with more visual options coming soon from advanced models like Google’s Imagen 3, Muse, and DreamBooth.
Future Enhancements
Look forward to even more integrations, including Google’s Imagen 3 and Runway’s Gen2 for advanced image and video generation, as well as enhanced text models like Claude 2 and Gemini’s multimodal capabilities.
Focs is an innovative app built on the concepts of simplicity, freedom, and focus, becoming an integral part of your workflow!
Privacy and Accessibility Support
Focs uses the Android AccessibilityService API to enhance focus by blocking distracting websites while working on projects. This feature is designed to help users maintain concentration and does not collect any personal information. All operations are performed locally on your device.

Full Description: AI task manager: reminders, calendar sync, tasks from emails & ChatGPT assistant
App Info Modal:
Ping is an AI-driven Task Manager and To-Do List that helps you plan tasks, schedule reminders, sync with your calendar, and collaborate with your team. Dictate tasks using voice commands, convert emails, photos and Slack messages into tasks, and let AI set deadlines and summaries for you. Access everything on Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android—perfect for personal GTD or advanced project management.
• 🎙️ Voice Dictation: Add tasks by speaking, and AI automatically creates titles, reminders, and due dates.
• 📸 Photo to Task: Snap a photo—Ping AI will create a task with an actionable title and summarized key facts! Easily convert a WhatsApp or email screenshot into a task!
• 📧 Email to Task: Turn starred emails into actionable items with AI-generated titles and summaries.
• 🤖 AI Task Assistant: Get real-time help to accomplish your tasks faster.
• 💬 Slack Integration: Easily convert messages into tasks and track progress without leaving Slack.
• 📅 Calendar Sync: Keep tasks aligned with your schedule and never miss a deadline.
• 🔔 Reminders & Snooze: Set notifications and snooze tasks when you need flexibility.
• 🏷️ Colored Tags & Repeating Tasks: Organize to-dos with tags and automate routine tasks.
• 📋 Kanban Boards & Collaboration: Visualize your workflow, delegate tasks, and mention teammates directly.
• 📈 Project Management: Create task dependencies and monitor progress for small or complex projects.
• 🚀 ChatGPT Integration: Manage tasks using natural language commands and get step-by-step guidance.
• 🌐 Sync Across Devices: Stay organized anywhere, anytime, on all your devices.
Ping offers both simple and advanced modes, letting you manage personal errands or coordinate entire team workflows. Upgrade your productivity with powerful AI features and real-time collaboration today!

Full Description: With AI manage your todo's and goals...keep your busy life organized
App Info Modal:
ezyorganizer: ORGANIZE YOUR TODOs … POWERED BY AI !!
Do you ever have these thoughts......
What time is my gym session?
When do the kids need to be at practice?
When is my niece's birthday ?
When do we need to pay the builder? ...and how much?
Did my client pay me last week?
How many times did I go for a run last week?
Did my children finish their tasks this morning?
If so, ezyorganizer powered by AI gives you all everything you need to help you stay on top of your todo's and keep your busy life organized, simple and easy to use.
AI
Unleash the power of AI on your calendar. Ask AI to create entries in your diary, or any question about your diary in your natural speaking voice, and AI will respond in seconds... create an appointment? create a todo list? when do you have a todo scheduled?.. how much does a coaching lesson cost?.. how much did you spend on eating out in the last month?... how many times did you complete a goal?, when was the last time you attended a concert?.. and so much more... it's HANDS FREE, NO TYPING, NO SWIPING, SPEAK NATURALLY and let AI do the rest.
INFORMATION AT A GLANCE
Our handy display will quickly show you the information that matters most.. how does my spending compare to budget?, am I on track to complete my goals?, how many times have I completed a recurring todo?, who's sharing my calendar?, ... and much more.
ALERTS & REMINDERS
Never miss an important todo, appointment or task... set alerts to remind you.
SHARE YOUR CALENDAR
You can share and track your calendar and plans with family, friends, colleagues, manage suppliers or contractors, stay in touch with instructors, teachers, literally ANYONE... ezyorganizer makes sure you’re in control and synched with those that really matter.
TAGS AND SEARCH
Organise your todos using tags... combined with our powerful search, your todos are always just a click away and easy to find... no matter how many you have.
QUICK START TODO TEMPLATES
And we help you get started with predefined todo templates for everything from APPOINTMENTS, WEDDINGS, HOME RENOVATIONS, HOLIDAYS to events, activities, hobbies and kids schedules.... or you can make your own.
WEDDINGS, BIRTHDAYS & EVENTS.
Let ezyorganizer help you effectively plan for any event…. weddings, birthdays, conferences, parties, trips, or a family project. Create your plan, assign to-dos, manage budgets, track status, communicate to attendees and then rest easy, your event is organized & under control.
HOME RENOVATIONS
Ezyorganizer can even help you with complicated, long-term projects such as Home Builds & Renovations... offering homeowners, professionals, contractors and realtors complete control of their plans. Manage and keep track of progress, know the budget, track payments, send real time messages, monitor the quality of work, ezyorganizer reduces your stress & keeps you in charge. Be more in control of your home build or renovation project, easily communicate with professionals, builders, contractors and tradespersons. Design a plan, share progress and avoid delays.
HOBBIES, LESSONS, GIGS AND SPORTS.
Any activity you are involved in, plan and keep track of everything: hobbies, gigs, kids tutoring, sports or music lessons. Use the calendar to diarise your sessions, track payments made or due, chat with your family, client, teacher, store files and invoices and more. Chat and communicate with everyone and anyone, keep your diary organized and stay in control of your life!
* subscription required, but no payment required during your first 3 days TRIAL, cancel at any time, pricing may vary slightly due to local taxes and currency conversion at time of purchase.

Full Description: The surprisingly simple way to organize the family. Shared calendar & lists.
App Info Modal:
Cozi Family Organizer is the surprisingly simple way to manage everyday family life. With a shared calendar, reminders, grocery list and more, Cozi is a 3-time Mom’s Choice Award Winner and The TODAY Show “must-have app” for a better life.
Cozi is free, easy to use, and available from any mobile device or computer.
FAMILY CALENDAR
• Keep track of everyone’s schedules in one place with a simple color-coded calendar
• Set reminders for yourself or others in the family so no one misses practice or an important event
• Send automated daily or weekly agenda emails to any family member
• Subscribe to other calendars you use like your work calendar, school calendars, personal calendars, and team schedules.
SHOPPING LISTS & TO DO LISTS
• Everyone in the family will always know what you need at the grocery store
• See items added by other family members in real time, and never forget the one thing you really need to make dinner
• Create to do lists for anything - a shared to do list for the whole family, chore checklists for the kids, a vacation packing checklist.
RECIPE BOX
• Organize all your recipes in one place that's accessible anytime, anywhere - at home or at the store
• Add ingredients to your shopping list quickly and schedule meals onto your calendar
• Cook from your phone with helpful features like the no-dim button that keeps your screen on while you're cooking
MORE ABOUT COZI
• Your Cozi calendar, shopping lists, to do items, and recipe box are accessible from any mobile device or computer
• No matter where or how your family signs in to Cozi, everyone will be looking at the same information
• The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password
• International users please note: This is the U.S. version of Cozi Family Organizer and not all features may function as expected.
COZI GOLD
All the features listed above are free. Cozi also offers an optional ad-free premium subscription called Cozi Gold which gives you additional features, including access to add, edit and view events more than 30 days ahead, more reminders, mobile month view, change notifications, birthday tracker, and home screen widgets.
NOTE: If you experience any problems with your Cozi app, please don't hesitate to contact us directly at cozi.com/support. We're unable to help if you only leave a comment in the app store. Our support team is top notch and we want to help you!

Full Description: AI-powered business plan generator for entrepreneurs & small business owners.
App Info Modal:
Introducing Bizplanr, the all-new AI-powered business plan maker that helps you turn your ideas into investor-ready business plans at your fingertips.
Creating a business plan has always been a hassle for entrepreneurs—you don’t have relevant experience, excellent writing skills, as well as time, relevant resources, and flexibility.
The Bizplanr app is the solution. Our mission is to make business planning organized, accessible, and affordable for entrepreneurs and small business owners using our AI-powered business plan generator.
How? By helping you…
-  Create business plans on your smartphone
-  Generate a complete plan in just 10 minutes
-  Draft your first business plan for free
-  Organize, download, and share your plans on the go.
Bizplanr’s key features and benefits include:
- Guided business plan builder: Enter details about your business, answer a few questions, and see your business plan coming through.
- AI Virtual Business Advisor: It’s your go-to business advisor. You can ask it anything about your plan you need help with.
- Free business plan video guide: New to business planning? Go through the quick, step-by-step video guide to help you get started.
- User-friendly interface: Anyone can easily use and create business plans using Bizplanr, no matter the experience level.
- Easy export and sharing: Download and share your business plans with clients, investors, partners, or lenders with ease.
How does our AI business plan generator work:
The process of generating a business plan using Bizplanr is pretty simple.
(1) Sign up using your Email or Google Account.
(2) Visit home & click on “Create your business plan” to proceed.
(3) Fill in the necessary business and financial information, and your business plan will be generated.
(4) Ask the Virtual Business Advisor anything about your business you need help with.
(5) Proofread, edit, and download your business plan.
We offer solutions to:
•  Startups and small business owners
•  Business plan consultants and advisor
•  Business students and learners
•  Growing and expanding businesses
•  Solopreneurs
•  Idea stage startups
•  And more.
Need help with any of the mentioned solutions?
What are you waiting for? Download the Bizplanr App and create your first business plan. It’s 100% free.
If you need any help or have any questions about our AI business plan generator, you may contact us:

Full Description: Make your daily routine easy with a science-based ADHD Planner & Organizer/Timer
App Info Modal:
RoutineFlow is an ADHD planner and organizer that puts your success on autopilot by building a consistent daily routine with you. With this routine timer you can not only create a morning routine but organize your schedule for the entire week.
See for yourself using a smart routine timer can be a game-changer for managing ADHD or autism. Five reasons for why you should use an ADHD planner:
1. Get more done by tracking your routine every day
2. Establish powerful routines that stick even if you have ADHD as an adult
3. Wake up excited by having a morning routine
4. Stop ADHD procrastination with guided routine playlists
5. Having an ADHD planner helps you stay on track for your routine
Create a routine with a timer for each task. Quickly enter flow state or ADHD hyperfocus and get in the zone while completing your morning routine. If you are doing cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), RoutineFlow is useful for establishing a simple routine.
According to Atomic Habits, routines are context dependent, especially if you have ADHD. That’s why RoutineFlow helps you build on existing good habits and overwrites bad habits by setting a context for each routine. You always know what’s happening before your routine, which is really important for your focus.
This is even more true if you have problems as an adult with ADHD without a planner for your daily habits.
To help neurodivergent folks or those with ADHD & autism, we also gamify the process of completing a routine by using an immersive timer, so you can challenge yourself to race the clock.
When starting to use this app for building a routine to manage ADHD or to manage autism, there are tons of templates available, like a morning routine or a study routine. Tailored ADHD routines are planned for the future. Choose one of the templates or start from scratch by creating a custom routine.
Features:
-AI Task Breakdown for ADHD and autism
-A beautiful visual ADHD planner for your week
-Track every habit or routine you have
-Create multi-step habits, for example a morning routine
-Beat ADHD adult related problems with gamification
-Assign a timer and an emoji to each task
-Get notified whenever it is time to complete a routine
-No more getting distracted even if you have ADHD
-Finish each task laser focused with a timer
-Visualize your habit progress with beautiful statistics
-Analytics for time blindness if you have ADHD
-Clean dark mode
I’m an ADHD solo developer building apps, not a big company. That’s why it’s super motivating for me to hear from you, if you like my ADHD organizer. Simply reach out at thomas@routineflow.app.
If you became more productive, reduced task overwhelm or managed your ADHD or autism better with RoutineFlow, please leave a good review on the Play Store, it really helps me a lot :)

Full Description: Magic ADHD Planner that breaks down tasks for neurodivergent minds
App Info Modal:
"This ADHD Planner is unlike anything I have ever seen before."
neurolist is an ADHD planner created specifically for neurodivergent people who need a way to organize their tasks without feeling overwhelmed. If you’re living with ADHD or navigating life as a neurodivergent person, this is the planner that’s got your back.
Why neurolist is the Best ADHD Planner for Neurodivergent Folks:
Break Down Big Tasks
With ADHD, even small tasks can feel huge. Our AI list maker understands this and helps you break down those big, scary tasks into manageable steps. No more ADHD task paralysis. Just add a to-do, and our AI generates a checklist—estimating how long it will take and organizing it into your planner. One tap turns it into a simple, step-by-step list that’s easier to tackle.
Perfect for Brain Dumps
ADHD and neurodivergent brains often have lots of unstructured thoughts. neurolist’s AI Import feature is designed for this—it takes your brain dumps and converts them into a clear, organized list that you can import into your planner. It’s the perfect tool for any neurodivergent user who needs a planner that is able to turn chaos into clarity.
Simple Design, Big Impact
The interface of neurolist is kept intentionally simple & calm, making it the ideal ADHD planner for neurodivergent users. It’s straightforward and easy to navigate, so you can focus on making lists, planning and doing, without getting lost in complicated menus.
Keep Every Task Safe
Even though ADHD brains can sometimes misplace tasks, neurolist’s task library has you covered. This ADHD planner lets you recover saved tasks with a single tap, giving neurodivergent users the peace of mind that they can reuse important AI-made lists.
Smart Timing for ADHD
neurolist helps neurodivergent folks overcome time-blindness. With its smart timer, each task becomes part of a playlist, with dedicated time slots for each subtask. Voice notifications keep you on track, so neurodivergent users can focus on getting things done without constant distractions.
Flexible and Adaptable
Whether you have ADHD, autism, or another neurodivergent condition, this is the planner that adapts to your needs. It evolves as you do, offering a flexible AI planner experience. And this is just the beginning—soon, neurolist will let you add even more context to your tasks and provide advanced productivity insights tailored for ADHD and neurodivergent users.
neurolist is more than just a planner. It’s your ADHD-friendly list maker, designed to make life easier for neurodivergent people. Ready to transform how you plan? Download neurolist (neurodivergent + list) today and finally work with an ADHD planner / organizer that understands your brain.

App Info Modal:
Welcome to Splitti, this app is a proven ADHD planner & organizer for those who think they might have or have ADHD, or anyone looking to enhance their executive functioning skills. Developed by developers who battled procrastination.
Try the innovative task management app where AI transforms your goals into manageable focus steps for free.
AI DAILY PLANNER & ORGANIZER
Our cutting-edge AI analyzes your goals and breaks them down into smaller tasks. It's like having a smart assistant who understands exactly how you work.
CUSTOMIZATION
The app learns from your input, tailoring tasks to your work style and priorities. It''s about personalizing them to fit you. We understand that everyone's ADHD experience is unique.
STOP PROCRASTINATION
With tasks made to match your pace and preferences, overcoming procrastination becomes easier. Witness how a tailored approach can change your productivity, best daily focus keeper for free.
SMART GOAL SETTINGS
Enter your goals and let AI dissect them into smaller steps is dedicated to providing you with the most effective strategies for managing ADHD-related challenges and maximizing your potential.
PROFILE PERSONALIZATION
Share about yourself and watch as the AI tailors tasks, advice, and prioritization specifically for you.
DEEP ANALYSIS
Dive into each task with AI-driven insights and discussions. Understand and approach your work with clarity, curb ADHD with daily organizer and planner.
POMODORO TIMER
Stay focused with the Pomodoro technique, accompanied by AI-generated productivity tips.
EISENHOWER MATRIX PRIORITIZATION
View your tasks in an automatically sorted Eisenhower matrix, based on your unique profile.
PRODUCTIVITY TRACKING
Time in focus to do and number of tasks completed by day and month: advanced progress tracker.
AI CHAT
Our responsive AI is always ready to offer advice, answer questions, and keep you motivated.
Whether you're a student, ADHD adult or anyone looking to streamline their tasks, Splitti is your go-to app. It's more than a daily planner & organizer; it's a personal productivity coach.
Developed with the user's needs at its core, Splitti is a testament to overcoming procrastination and achieving goals efficiently.
Try it now and experience a new era of planner & organizer for free!

Full Description: The ideal daily planner for all your time management needs
App Info Modal:
Doing more things with your time. Increasing your productivity. Improving your daily routine.
That and more is what you can do with TimeTune, your schedule planner and time blocking app.
👍 RECOMMENDED BY EXPERTS
Jessica McCabe from “How to ADHD” recommends TimeTune as an ideal tool to build solid routines and give structure to your day.
😀 WHAT IS TIMETUNE?
TimeTune is a schedule planner and time blocking app. Use it to organize your agenda, plan routines and increase your productivity.
Do you know why some people can get plenty of things done in a single day while your time slips through your fingers?
The answer is that they have a very structured distribution of time. They organize their agenda with a planner and have strong time management habits. That allows them to seize the day and complete their tasks.
With TimeTune Schedule Planner you can do the same.
👩‍🔧 HOW DOES IT WORK?
TimeTune uses time blocks to build your agenda. Just add time blocks to your day or use time blocks to build templates that can be reused at any time, like a morning routine or a timetable.
Templates allow you to plan upcoming schedules, routines, timetables or work shifts in a flash. You will enjoy an automated agenda.
TimeTune Schedule Planner also shows you statistics to see where the time goes. Check them to see if your time is correctly structured and how you can improve.
You can add custom reminders to your time blocks, so you don’t forget your agenda: reminders with custom vibrations, custom sounds, voice, etc (ideal if you have ADHD).
With TimeTune Schedule Planner you can create a time management system as simple or as complex as you need. This daily planner will allow you to finally complete your tasks and save time.
🤓 WHY DOES IT WORK?
Time blocking is a scheduling method that divides your day into smaller segments of time for specific tasks. If you add statistics, you get the perfect time management system to optimize your productivity.
A structured day increases focus and motivation. Time blocking on a daily planner allows you to concentrate on the task at hand and avoid distractions.
As Cal Newport, author of “Deep Work” states:
“Time blocking generates a massive amount of productivity. A 40-hour time-blocked work week produces the same amount of output as a 60+ hour work week without structure”
It’s no wonder high achievers like Benjamin Franklin, Bill Gates and many others embraced this planning method and used a daily planner to organize their agenda in a structured way.
Also, for people with ADHD, time blocking can be a crucial approach to tackle their agenda and avoid anxiety. If you have ADHD, TimeTune Schedule Planner allows you to focus on each task, improve your daily routine and see where the time actually goes.
🤔 WHAT CAN I DO WITH TIMETUNE?
With TimeTune Schedule Planner you can:
★ Increase your focus and productivity
★ Organize your agenda and reach your goals
★ Improve your time management skills
★ Plan your daily routine
★ Set routines, timetables and work shifts
★ Have a structured agenda
★ Use it as your daily planner and routine planner
★ Remove routine tasks from other calendars
★ Analyze your time and discover time leaks
★ Add custom reminders (ideal for ADHD)
★ Free up time for yourself
★ Organize your life with a better work/life balance
★ Avoid anxiety and burnout
★ Do everything in your agenda
★ Do tasks in time if you have ADHD
🙋 WHO IS IT FOR?
If you would like to do more things with your time, TimeTune Schedule Planner is for you.
Users with ADHD also tell us that TimeTune helps them a lot with their schedule and use the app as their routine manager. If you have ADHD, try TimeTune and let us know what you think.
Thank you very much! 🥰

Full Description: Calendly helps you schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails.
App Info Modal:
We take the work out of connecting with others so you can accomplish more.
HOW IT WORKS
• CREATE SIMPLE RULES: Setup is easy. Let Calendly know your availability preferences and it’ll do the work for you.
•  SHARE YOUR LINKS: Quickly copy your Calendly links and paste them into an email, text, or any other app, saving you time while you’re away from your computer.
• SCHEDULE: They pick a time and the event is added to your calendar.
FEATURES THAT USERS WILL ENJOY
•  CALENDAR INTEGRATIONS: Works with your Google, Outlook, Office 365 or iCloud calendar so you’re never double booked.
•  CONTROL: Set buffer times between meetings, prevent last minute meetings, create secret event types, and more.
•  FLEXIBLE: Supports 1-on-1, round robin and collective availability meetings
•  TIME ZONE INTELLIGENT: Seamless time zone detection for your invitees so everyone’s on the same page.
•  WORKS WITH YOUR APPS: Automate tasks with Zoom, Google Meet, Salesforce, GoToMeeting, Zapier and more.
•  GROWS WITH YOUR TEAM: Works great for individuals, teams and departments.
