Full Description: Reach fluency in Spanish, French, and English through a speaking-first method!
App Info Modal:
Get ready to take your language skills to the next level with Speak, the ultimate language learning app focusing on improving your speaking abilities. Powered by cutting-edge AI technology, Speak ensures that you gain fluency by engaging in real-life conversations and receiving instant feedback. Whether you are learning Spanish or learning English, Speak's AI-powered lessons will have you learning a new language fast.
With Speak, you'll feel like you have a personal language tutor right in your pocket. Our app provides immersive speaking practice sessions that simulate real-life scenarios, allowing you to become confident in your conversational English and Spanish skills. The advanced AI function analyzes your speech, providing valuable assessment on pronunciation, intonation, and fluency. Say goodbye to those language barriers as you receive real-time feedback, enabling you to make necessary adjustments and improve your speaking skills on the spot.
Our comprehensive language learning curriculum is available for English and Spanish learners, ensuring that you become fluent in both languages. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Speak caters to your individual needs and helps you progress at your own pace. You'll love the personalized progress tracking, which helps you identify areas that need improvement, allowing you to focus your efforts effectively.
Speak's method is simple:
STEP 1: Do a real language learning lesson!
Learn real-life, essential phrases with your dedicated local teacher.
STEP 2: Practice speaking the language!
Repeat the learned phrases until you can speak without thinking twice!
STEP 3: AI Tutor provides personalized language feedback!
With the latest AI technology, you can practice anywhere and anytime! Get real-time feedback on pronunciations, grammar, and much more.
STEP 4: Real conversations in your chosen language!
Now put what you've learned into real-life situations and speak with confidence!
No more boring textbooks or one-sided conversations! With Speak, you'll experience interactive and engaging language practice that feels like a real-life conversation. Break free from traditional language learning and download Speak now! Gain fluency, receive real-time feedback, and become a confident speaker in English and Spanish.
There are plenty of other language apps out there, but Speak's key difference comes down to getting you speaking English or Spanish out loud on day 1.
SPEAK MEMBERSHIP
Speak offers both monthly and annual auto-renewing subscriptions. Become a Speak Member to gain unlimited access to all courses, singles, review material, and other content within Speak.
The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your Google Play Account settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your Google Play Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your Google Play Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Full Description: Audiobooks, eBooks, comics and manga, music, movies, TV, and more with BingePass
App Info Modal:
Discover limitless entertainment and knowledge with hoopla Digital. Access more than 1.5 million audiobooks, eBooks, comics and manga, music, movies, TV, and more with BingePass. Read, listen, and watch 24/7 without ads or late fees, free with your library card!
📚 eBooks: From gripping mysteries to thought-provoking non-fiction; heartwarming romance to captivating historical tales, hoopla's vast eBook collection celebrates diversity by offering titles that resonate with readers from all walks of life.
🎧 Audiobooks: Turn your commute, workout, or leisure time into an enriching experience with our extensive audiobook collection. Listen to captivating narrations by talented performers that bring stories to life.
🎬 Movies and TV: hoopla's expansive video content library offers popular movies, TV shows, and BingePasses for every age and interest. Whether you're in the mood for Hollywood blockbusters or indie gems, you'll find it all here.
🎶 Music: From chart-topping hits to hidden gems, dig into a music library that suits your every mood. Create playlists, check out new artists, and enjoy uninterrupted album streaming. Or use the shuffle feature to have songs randomly played from one album or all albums you have currently borrowed.
💬 Comics and Manga: Read classic comic, graphic novel, and manga series, discover fresh titles, and follow your favorite characters on exciting adventures. Our groundbreaking ActionView reading technology brings comics and manga to life with a panel-by-panel reading experience.
🔓 hoopla BingePass: With just one borrow, get unlimited access to entire collections of content for a limited time. It’s a great way to explore awesome online content—and a lot of it!
📥 Stream or Download: With no waiting, titles can be streamed immediately or downloaded to phones or tablets for offline enjoyment.

Full Description: Zeemo is a video editor that uses AI to generate and translate video captions.
App Info Modal:
Create trending subtitles with AI and add dual subtitles to your video automatically.
Zeemo seeks to quickly and automatically add accurate captions to videos. You don't need any experience in video editing and yet make amazing talking videos with captions easily. Zeemo is perfect for content creators, vloggers, influencers, or anyone making videos for TikTok, YouTube, Shorts, Instagram Reels, and more.
WHY ADD CAPTIONS AND SUBTITLES?
Research shows that 85% of people watch videos with the sound off. adding captions and subtitles to your videos is like giving your content a passport to reach more people! It helps not just those who are deaf but also opens up your videos to a global audience, no matter the language. Plus, it boosts your video's chances of being discovered in searches and keeps viewers engaged, especially when they're watching on mute. So, whether you're creating tutorials, entertainment, or sharing stories, adding captions is the key to making your videos more welcoming and enjoyable for all.
ARE YOU STRUGGLING WITH ADDING CAPTIONS AND SUBTITLES TO YOUR VIDEOS?
Look no further than Zeemo app – the ultimate video editor with a powerful caption generator built right in. With Zeemo, adding captions to videos has never been easier. Just open Zeemo, upload video, choose language and captions are ready!
FEATURES
- AI Captions: Automatically add captions to your videos
Zeemo is designed with a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to use for anyone, even if you have no prior experience with video editing. Batch edit is available when you when you need to edit subtitles in bulk.
- Multilingual Subtitles Recognition:
Available in more than 100 languages, like Chinese, Persian, Urdu, etc.
- AI Translate:
Automatically translate captions in 110+ languages.
- Trendy Templates:
Boost views with trendy subtitle templates like Mr. Beast, Alex Hormozi etc.
- AI Emoji, GIFs & Stickers
Automatically add emojis to your captions, and you can also add GIFs or stickers that make your video more engaging and fun!
- Enhance Your Videos with B-roll
Make your stories more dynamic and engaging with B-roll footage!
- Support Custom Fonts
Easily upload your own fonts to give your videos a personalized touch.
- Video Caption Editing: Highlight any words you want on the subtitle, and freely add text like narrations and headlines.
- Video Editing: Zeemo App comes with a built-in video editor that allows you to cut, trim, and edit videos to create the perfect final product.
- Audio Subtitle Export: Zeemo also allows you to export audio subtitles, making it easy to create captions for talking videos or podcasts.
- Video length and quality: Up to 5 hours. Maximum 4K quality supported.
Zeemo App is perfect for a wide range of applications, including:
- YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok Video Editing - With its powerful subtitle editing tools and easy-to-use interface, Zeemo is perfect for anyone who wants to take their video editing to the next level.
- Adding captions to your vlog or short videos - Add captions and subtitles to your personal videos to make them more engaging and accessible.
- Bilingual Subtitle Creation – Use Zeemo to create bilingual subtitles for your videos, making them accessible to a wider audience.
ABOUT SUBSCRIPTION
- Subscribe for Pro access to all features.
- Subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Auto-renewal may be turned off in the user's Account Settings after purchase.
TERMS OF USE
https://zeemo.ai/app/user-service.html
GET IN TOUCH WITH ZEEMO TEAM
Any more questions? Please contact our customer support: support@zeemo.ai
ZEEMO SOCIAL MEDIA

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zeemoaitech/

Full Description: Big name books and exclusive stories you'll love to listen to.
App Info Modal:
Welcome to a wide world of wonderful audiobooks, ebooks, and things that aren’t books but are still pretty great.
Storytel is home to beloved stories, in-depth podcasts, and exclusive Storytel Originals.
Whether you listen or read, you’ll find the right story for any moment.
• Explore a massive library of stories in English and other languages
• Jump freely from story to story until you find one you love
• Build your bookshelf and get personalized recommendations
• Find what fits your mood, like crime, feel-good, or self-development
• Follow your favorite authors and series
• Browse and share reviews and reactions
• Try out that book your friend keeps talking about
• Discover what’s trending in the culture
LISTEN AND READ YOUR WAY
• Listen to audio stories on your mobile, tablet, Chromecast, and Wear OS watch, as well as in your car (Android Auto, Android Automotive)
• Stream stories or download them for later

• Listen at your own pace: regular, sped up, or slowed down
• Set bookmarks and attach your thoughts as notes
• Drift off to dreamland with the sleep timer
• Spare those pretty eyes with Dark Mode
• See your stats and set a Listening Goal
KIDS MODE INCLUDED
• Let your kid find adventure in a space with just children’s stories
• Show or hide children’s books in your bookshelf
• Set your own pin code for parental control
HOW IT WORKS
Storytel is available in 25+ countries, including both local and international story treasures in different languages. A subscription gives you access to our ever-growing library of audiobooks, ebooks, and other stories.
When a free trial is offered, we will ask you to add a payment method when starting the trial. But don't worry – if you cancel before the last day of the trial you won't be charged.

Full Description: Starfall offers numerous activities. Become a subscriber to access all content.
App Info Modal:
Starfall® fun activities, games, and songs includes reading, math, music, and more – read, learn, and play preschool to fifth grade. Includes free and subscriber content.
Starfall provides an Enhanced Accessible Index for children with visual, hearing, or mobility impairments. For more information, please contact Customer Service at (+1) 303-417-6414.
Join Zac the Rat® and his friends on an exciting learning journey, starting with the ABCs and 123s and advancing up to grade 5 grammar and mathematics. Starfall's playful open format intuitively guides children through sequential learning objectives for reading, math, art, music, and social subjects like kindness and caring.
*Highlights*
*Reading (phonics, fluency, grammar) -- ABCs, Learn to Read, I’m Reading, Talking Library, Punctuation, Parts of Speech
*Math -- Numbers, Addition and Subtraction, Multiplication and Division, Geometry and Measurement, Fractions
*More -- Holiday Activities, Nursery Rhymes, Sing-Alongs, Interactive Calendar
*Why Starfall*
*Research based, teacher tested, child approved. Starfall's systematic approach was created by experienced educators using time-tested instructional methods.
*Try it for free. All of the basics for learning how to read are available to everyone.
*No advertisements. Whether a free user or subscriber, you won’t see any ads.
*Pass it forward! Subscribers gain access to hundreds of additional activities and support the free sections for others to enjoy.
*What people are saying about Starfall*
Listed on PC Magazine’s “15 best Online Learning Services for Kids,” Think Five’s “Top 5 Most Used Apps by Elementary Teachers,” and as one Parent's Magazine's "70 Best Apps for Families."
"Kids can learn about letter recognition, phonics, and reading. Skill acquisition is appropriately gradual... Starfall does an excellent job of offering clear and intriguing early literacy lessons." —Common Sense Media
“I truly believe that Starfall set the foundation for my future.”
–Sarah, undergraduate at Stanford University
*Subscription information*
If you choose to purchase a Starfall subscription, a $5.99 (USD) payment will be applied to your Google Play account upon confirmation of purchase and monthly after that. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. This subscription is valid only for home use on devices signed in to your Google Play account. Google Play does not support Family Library or family payment methods for in-app subscription purchases.
*Additional Info*
This app requires an internet connection and is intended for Pre-K, Kindergarten, and Grades 1-5. It also supports English language development, special education, and homeschool environments.
Privacy Policy: https://teach.starfall.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://teach.starfall.com/terms
About Starfall: https://teach.starfall.com/about
Starfall Education Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

Full Description: Personalized learning across K-12 subjects
App Info Modal:
IXL is personalized learning! Trusted by over 1 million educators and parents, IXL is proven to accelerate student achievement. And with the award-winning IXL app, students can master skills anytime, anywhere!
See how IXL meets the unique needs of over 16 million learners (and counting!):
SUPERIOR SKILL-BUILDING
With IXL’s full curriculum of over 10,000 skills, students of all levels can learn the exact topics they need, whether they’re reviewing past concepts or exploring new territory. Immediate feedback and step-by-step answer explanations help students work through their mistakes and make lasting progress. Plus, question difficulty adapts to challenge students at just the right level and help them grow.
MATH MASTERY
With IXL’s preK-12 curriculum, every learner can excel in math! From skip-counting with pictures to graphing quadratic functions, students interact with dynamic problem types that bring each concept to life. And with unlimited questions to explore, students can practice as much as they need to master each skill, and never see the same problem twice.
LANGUAGE ARTS LEARNING
IXL’s preK-12 curriculum helps build strong readers and writers! From comprehension to composition, IXL breaks down each concept into highly targeted skills that help students grow from where they are. Fun and relevant questions engage students as they learn new vocabulary, correct grammar mistakes, analyze text, strengthen writing skills, and more.
SCIENCE, SOCIAL STUDIES, AND SPANISH
Build knowledge across all core subjects! With comprehensive curriculum in 2nd through 8th grade science and social studies, students can learn exciting and relevant concepts about the world around them. And with foundational Spanish, students can get started on the path toward Spanish fluency!
REAL-TIME DIAGNOSTIC
IXL’s Real-Time Diagnostic pinpoints each student’s current knowledge level in math and English language arts. As students answer questions, they’ll discover more about themselves, and reveal personalized recommendations on the best skills to learn next!
IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
Interactive features, from drag-and-drop questions to graphing tools, allow students to engage with the material in new ways. With handwriting recognition, students can easily write in math answers with their fingertips. On tablets, students can work through each problem by writing on their screen—no scrap paper needed! Plus, colorful awards highlight students’ accomplishments and make learning fun!
PROVEN RESULTS
Research has shown that IXL improves student outcomes more than any other product or method. IXL is trusted by over 1,000,000 teachers worldwide!
ACTIONABLE ANALYTICS
View reports on all progress at IXL.com! Tackle any trouble spots with specific insights and clear next steps. And celebrate reaching each new milestone with an official certificate!
Practice 10 questions each day for free. To accelerate growth, become an IXL member! For $19.95 per month, you’ll get access to a fully personalized learning experience with comprehensive curriculum, meaningful guidance, progress tracking, fun awards, and more!
IXL is kidSAFE certified and COPPA-compliant. For more information, please visit:
Membership details: https://www.ixl.com/membership
Privacy Policy: https://www.ixl.com/privacypolicy

Full Description: For the culturally curious – stories from around the world
App Info Modal:
Are you curious about what Van Gogh’s Starry Night looks like up close? Have you ever toured the ancient Maya temples or met the inspirational figures of Black history? Do you want to learn about Japan’s unique food culture or incredible Indian railways?
Google Arts & Culture puts the treasures, stories and knowledge of over 2,000 cultural institutions from 80 countries at your fingertips. From the suffragettes who fought for women’s rights, to performing arts at the Paris Opera, to NASA’s archive of stunning images, discover stories about our cultural heritage. It’s your doorway to explore the art, history, people and wonders of our world.
Highlights:
• Art Transfer – Take a photo and transform it with classic artworks
• Art Selfie – Discover portraits that look like you
• Color Palette – Find art by using the colors of your photo
• Art Projector – See how artworks look in real size
• Pocket Gallery – Wander through immersive galleries and get up close to art
• Art Camera – Explore high-definition artworks
• 360° videos – Experience culture in 360 degrees
• Virtual reality tours – Step inside world-class museums
• Street View – Tour famous sites and landmarks
• Explore by time and color – Travel through time and see the rainbow through art
• Art Recogniser – Point your device camera at artworks to learn more about them, even when offline (at select museums only)
More features:
• Exhibits – Take guided tours curated by experts
• Favorites – Save and group your favorite artworks into galleries to share with friends or students
• Nearby – Find museums and exhibitions near you
• Notifications – Subscribe to receive weekly highlights or favorite content updates
• Translate – Use the translate button to read about exhibits from around the world in your language
Permissions notice:
• Location: used to recommend cultural sites and events based on your current location
• Camera: used to recognise artworks and provide related information about them
• Contacts (Get Accounts): used to allow sign in with a Google Account, in order to store users' favourites and preferences
• Storage: used to allow artworks to be recognised and related information to be accessed while offline

App Info Modal:
Sharpen your math, data, and computer science skills in minutes a day with Brilliant. For professionals, students, and lifelong learners alike—Brilliant is the best way to learn. Build math skills with intro to advanced courses covering algebra, geometry, calculus, probability and statistics, trigonometry, linear algebra, and more. Whatever math, data, computer science, or science topic you’re looking to skill up in—Brilliant’s got you covered.

Brilliant makes it easy to stay on track, see your progress, and level up in as little as 15 minutes a day by building your problem solving skills one concept at a time.

Explore intro to advanced courses in algebra, geometry, calculus, logic, statistics and probability, scientific thinking, physics, quantum mechanics, AI, neural networks, algorithms, python, and beyond.

Full Description: AstroSure.ai: Your 24/7 AI-powered companion for all things astrology
App Info Modal:
AstroSure.ai – Where Ancient Wisdom Meets Modern Technology
AstroSure.ai is a ground-breaking astrology app that blends the timeless knowledge of Vedic astrology with the precision and efficiency of cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Whether you’re looking for guidance in love, career, finances, or personal well-being, AstroSure.ai provides accurate, personalized insights to help you navigate life’s journey with clarity and confidence.
With AstroSure.ai, you can enjoy a seamless experience that bridges ancient traditions with modern convenience, all at your fingertips.
Why Choose AstroSure.ai?
AstroSure.ai redefines astrology for the digital age. It’s more than just an app—it’s your 24/7 companion for spiritual well-being and self-discovery. By combining AI technology with expert validation, we ensure every insight is tailored to your unique needs, helping you make informed decisions about your personal and professional life.
Key Features
:
1. Personalized Astrological Insights
: Unlock highly individualized readings based on your unique birth details. From daily spiritual routines to auspicious day recommendations, AstroSure.ai ensures you receive guidance that resonates with your life.
2. Expert-Validated Profiles
Discover detailed astrological profiles with actionable advice. Always know the best time for important decisions, and receive personalized insights to enhance your relationships, career, health, and overall well-being.
3. Comprehensive Guidance
Explore a vast library of Vedic scriptures, mantras, chalisas, and aartis. Get answers to your questions on love, finances, and health, backed by centuries-old wisdom optimised by AI analytics.
4. Holistic Spiritual Growth
Go beyond astrology with remedies rooted in Vedic rituals. Achieve mental and emotional balance through curated mantras and spiritual routines designed to remedy doshas and bring peace.
5. Seamless and Cost Effective
Enjoy a ‘freemium’ model with no hidden costs. Access basic features for free or upgrade to an ad-free premium experience for uninterrupted guidance.
6. Instant Availability

How AstroSure.ai Helps You
AstroSure.ai is more than an astrology app—it’s a tool for self-discovery and growth. By reducing uncertainty and providing hope, it empowers you to make better decisions and embrace life with renewed confidence. AstroSure.ai is your constant companion in navigating life’s complexities.

Welcome to Freepik, your go-to app for all your design and editing needs!
Create professional content with easy-to-use AI tools like the Freepik AI Image Generator on your Android smartphone or tablet. Use Retouch to refine details, add elements, and remove imperfections, Upscale to boost resolution without losing quality, and Expand to extend your visuals. Adjust colors, apply filters, and make every image look its best—all in one intuitive online app.
- Background remover: Remove backgrounds in a snap and get your photos ready for any project. Just take a photo or pick one from your gallery. With one click, the background is gone. Then, you can add a new background with AI or download the image as a PNG file instantly.
- Reimagine: Generate multiple variations of any image in real time and explore different styles to match your creative vision. You can recreate an image as many times as you want and even customize it with a prompt while preserving the composition.
- Sketch to image: Turn doodles into detailed images in real time. Upload your drawing or create one on a blank canvas, and our AI will bring it to life, turning your ideas into reality.
Download the APP today, and let’s make something beautiful together!

Full Description: Learn and Practise with AI
App Info Modal:
"TalkAI Speaking Practice" uses advanced AI technology to help you practice spoken language effortlessly, confidently, and anytime, without barriers, allowing you to quickly master multiple languages!
[One-on-One AI Language Tutor] No need to spend a high price to hire a tutor or invest a lot of time selecting one—TalkAI Speaking Practice lets you practice with AI anytime. It tailors improvements and fixes based on your current level and weak points.
[Say Goodbye to Silent Learning] The fear of speaking or making mistakes is the biggest obstacle in language learning. TalkAI’s AI teachers are all friendly and supportive, allowing you to speak up, express yourself boldly, and gradually improve your speaking skills, helping you say goodbye to silent learning.
[Intelligent Conversations] TalkAI Speaking Practice supports multiple languages, including English, Chinese, Japanese, and German, with authentic pronunciation. It also offers adjustable speaking speeds, enabling you to have natural and fluent conversations with AI. We provide various conversation difficulty levels, track your progress, and offer real-time feedback to help you achieve your language learning goals intelligently.
[Conversation Assistance] If you encounter hesitations or inaccuracies in your conversation, don’t worry—our Sample Q&A feature will be a great help. With just a click, the software will provide standard, native-like sample expressions based on your input, guiding you to find the right answer.
[Translation & Read-Along] We’ve also integrated translation and read-along features. These not only help you expand your vocabulary but also enable you to develop authentic speaking expressions, meaning you can focus on what really matters—practicing your speaking skills—without worrying about language barriers or misunderstandings.
[Scenario Practice] Here, you can easily choose different scenarios to practice for your journey. Whether it’s for language exams, the workplace, or daily life, we’ve got you covered, helping you be well-prepared!
[Contact Us] TalkAI Speaking Practice is a newly launched app with many features still open for optimization. We offer multiple channels for feedback, including customer service, in-app surveys, and email feedback (devamzing@gmail.com). Your opinions are very important to us!
Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced learner, our app can help you practice foreign languages. With TalkAI Speaking Practice by your side, you can converse confidently, fluently, and effortlessly with intelligent AI. Download now and start practicing!

Full Description: Gender-specific healthcare
App Info Modal:
Use SORA to track and manage your health symptoms, get personalised health care plans; access specialist doctors (UK only), therapists, nutritionists; home-test kits (UK only), prescriptions (UK only), and medically approved articles and videos.
SORA was created by a team of scientists, clinicians, researchers and patients to create a platform which truly improves care pathways. We created a single platform to manage life-stage health conditions, including Menstrual Health, Endometriosis, PCOS, Fertility, Menopause, and Men’s Health.
We personalise the SORA platform to your condition, giving you an individualised experience. SORA helps you manage your symptoms, find patterns between your lifestyle and symptoms, and speak to specialists who understand.
Here is what you can expect from SORA:
Health Tracking
-  Everyone’s symptoms of the same condition vary. Hence, logging your symptoms and lifestyle data creates a digital blueprint of your condition that is personal to you.
-  Have we missed a symptom? Don’t worry you can add yours anyway! We also have a handy notes function to help you journal effectively.
Care Plan
-  Monitor changes, and get personalised health care plans and recommendations based on your logged symptoms.
-  Learn about important health patterns that can help you manage your symptoms.
Resources
-  Watch the latest videos to help you better manage your symptoms, and read medically approved content.
Support
-  Browse products and services recommended by SORA’s clinicians and users.
-  Products include home testing kits, supplements and tools to help manage pain.
-  Access specialists such as Doctors, Therapists and Nutritionists to support you.
Health Coach
-  If you’re stuck with what to do or you have simple questions about your health, you can chat with a health coach for advice, where you’ll be speaking to one of our registered nurses and physicians.
You have direct access to our support team to give us feedback. Are we missing features? Email us!

Full Description: A+ homework helper. Solve college and high school problems, tests, essays & more
App Info Modal:
Atlas's AI assistant for college and high school students is the most accurate and advanced homework helper, tutor, solver, and writer available. With Atlas, you'll never turn in a wrong answer again. This is because Atlas automatically studies and memorizes your actual class textbooks, readings, homework, tests, quizzes, lectures, notes, and slides to give you answers and explanations that are correct, accurate, and will help you get higher grades. With each response, Atlas cites the material from your class that it used to answer the question.
Overall, Atlas AI is a flexible tool for students and will work for all of your school needs. Here's how students supercharge their GPA with Atlas:
· Personal AI — Train Atlas on the actual class that you're in, so you get answers that are right.
· Math — Atlas solves complex math problems accurately, with no hallucinations. It solves complex homework and test problems with ease and shows its work to help you learn.
· Write essays — Atlas doesn't only have accurate AI essay writing capabilities. It also writes essays that include citations to the knowledge used to write the essay.
· Solve homework — Atlas scans your assignments and uses your class knowledge to solve problems, giving you instant answers and explanations that are always correct.
· Study — You can ask Atlas to create text-based flashcards, study guides, and practice tests that ensure you're prepared for any quiz or exam.
· Learn — Atlas can tutor you by explaining concepts to you in an approachable and personalized way.
· Summarize readings — Atlas scans your books and readings to help you get the high-level notes quickly.
Atlas is designed for every major, class, subject, college, high school, and university. Whether you're a STEM, chemistry, biology, math, coding, or research student, answers from Atlas are always cited with the knowledge that you need to score higher and learn easier.
Getting started with Atlas only takes a couple of minutes. Here's how it works:
1. Upload your class or course syllabi to Atlas. If you don't have them, don't worry!
2. Atlas scans your classes to determine the knowledge required to give you the most accurate answers.
3. Atlas trains itself on the knowledge required to solve, write, and teach for you.
4. Use Atlas to ask questions without worrying about whether the responses are right.
5. Over time, as you send more questions and resources to Atlas, it continues to learn and grow with you.
We know that when choosing an AI assistant for homework and tests, it's important to make sure that it's high quality, undetectable, and most importantly, correct. Try Atlas today!
